name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
*[Clears throat, surveys the half-empty hall, adjusts microphone nervously]*

Distinguished guests, esteemed colleagues, and... *[squints at empty seats]* ...apparently several hundred deeply fascinating empty chairs...

I stand before you today to discuss Germany's vital role in the global economy. Though perhaps I should start by discussing Germany's apparently less-than-vital role in filling these seats. *[Forced chuckle]*

You know, when I was told I would be speaking at Davos, I imagined something slightly different. More... how do you say... people? *[Tugs at collar]* But no matter. We Germans are quite used to efficiency, and what could be more efficient than addressing a room that's fifty percent air? Think of the reduced carbon footprint! *[Voice rising slightly]*

I see my colleague Mr. Gersemann managed to secure a front-row seat. *[Stares intensely]* Thank you, Hans. Your dedication to witnessing my public humiliation is truly touching. Please, make yourself comfortable. Perhaps you'd like to put your feet up? Take a nap? There are certainly enough empty seats to lie down across.

*[Shuffling papers unnecessarily]*

Let me tell you about our plans for industrial innovation... *[Notices someone leaving]* Oh, please, don't let me keep you! I'm sure there's a fascinating cryptocurrency panel happening somewhere. Or perhaps you're late for the "How to Pretend Germany Still Matters" workshop? *[Laughing slightly manically]*

You know, my predecessor Angela Merkel once spoke in this very hall. Standing room only, they say. *[Voice becoming increasingly bitter]* But times change, don't they? Perhaps I should have added some puppets to my presentation? Or promised everyone a free NFT? 

*[Loosens tie aggressively]*

Did you know that Germany is Europe's largest economy? No? Well, clearly none of you care, so why don't I tell you about my childhood hamster instead? His name was Klaus, and unlike SOME people, he always showed up when expected! *[Slams hand on podium]*

Oh, look! Someone else leaving. Wunderbar! Don't worry, I'll just raise my voice to reach you in the back as you flee- I mean, exit. GERMANY REMAINS COMMITTED TO GREEN ENERGY INITIATIVES! *[Shouting at retreating figures]*

*[Wiping brow, voice becoming unsteady]*

You know what's really fascinating about German fiscal policy? *[Long pause]* Neither do I anymore. I've completely forgotten my speech. Instead, let me count the empty seats. One, two, three... shall we all count together? No? Just me then? Like everything else today? FINE.

*[Loosens tie completely]*

Perhaps we should discuss the elephant in the room. Or should I say the elephants NOT in the room? *[Hysterical laughter]* Is this what we've become? Has Germany been reduced to the equivalent of a LinkedIn post no one likes? Should I have promised free bratwurst? Created a TikTok dance? WHAT DO YOU PEOPLE WANT FROM ME?

*[Collecting self momentarily]*

In conclusion... *[Papers scatter across podium]* ...in conclusion... Oh, why bother with a conclusion? Half of you are checking your phones, and the other half don't exist. 

*[Muttering under breath]* This is fine. Everything is fine. Totally, completely fine...

*[Straightening posture, sudden forced smile]*

Thank you all for your attention. I'll now take questions from the audience. *[Points to empty section]* Yes, you there, empty chair in row 17? No question? How predictable. Just like my approval ratings.

*[Steps away from podium, then returns quickly]*

And one final thing - to whoever parked the red Tesla in the VIP lot... actually, never mind. Like everything else today, it probably isn't there anymore either.

Guten Tag. Or whatever.

*[Drops microphone, immediately regrets it, picks it up and carefully places it back, apologizing to the microphone profusely]*
html:
*[Clears throat, surveys the half-empty hall, adjusts microphone nervously]*

Distinguished guests, esteemed colleagues, and... *[squints at empty seats]* ...apparently several hundred deeply fascinating empty chairs...

I stand before you today to discuss Germany's vital role in the global economy. Though perhaps I should start by discussing Germany's apparently less-than-vital role in filling these seats. *[Forced chuckle]*

You know, when I was told I would be speaking at Davos, I imagined something slightly different. More... how do you say... people? *[Tugs at collar]* But no matter. We Germans are quite used to efficiency, and what could be more efficient than addressing a room that's fifty percent air? Think of the reduced carbon footprint! *[Voice rising slightly]*

I see my colleague Mr. Gersemann managed to secure a front-row seat. *[Stares intensely]* Thank you, Hans. Your dedication to witnessing my public humiliation is truly touching. Please, make yourself comfortable. Perhaps you'd like to put your feet up? Take a nap? There are certainly enough empty seats to lie down across.

*[Shuffling papers unnecessarily]*

Let me tell you about our plans for industrial innovation... *[Notices someone leaving]* Oh, please, don't let me keep you! I'm sure there's a fascinating cryptocurrency panel happening somewhere. Or perhaps you're late for the "How to Pretend Germany Still Matters" workshop? *[Laughing slightly manically]*

You know, my predecessor Angela Merkel once spoke in this very hall. Standing room only, they say. *[Voice becoming increasingly bitter]* But times change, don't they? Perhaps I should have added some puppets to my presentation? Or promised everyone a free NFT?

*[Loosens tie aggressively]*

Did you know that Germany is Europe's largest economy? No? Well, clearly none of you care, so why don't I tell you about my childhood hamster instead? His name was Klaus, and unlike SOME people, he always showed up when expected! *[Slams hand on podium]*

Oh, look! Someone else leaving. Wunderbar! Don't worry, I'll just raise my voice to reach you in the back as you flee- I mean, exit. GERMANY REMAINS COMMITTED TO GREEN ENERGY INITIATIVES! *[Shouting at retreating figures]*

*[Straightening posture, sudden forced smile]*

Thank you all for your attention. I'll now take questions from the audience. *[Points to empty section]* Yes, you there, empty chair in row 17? No question? How predictable. Just like my approval ratings.

*[Steps away from podium, then returns quickly]*

name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
*Transcription of speech given January 15, 2025 in the Descartes Amphitheater, as translated from French to English*

My dear colleagues, my most esteemed fellow members of the French intelligentsia,

I stand before you tonight with a gravity unprecedented in the history of our Republic. The situation demands an analysis that is rigorous, dialectical, and – dare I say it – revolutionary.

The reactionary, in his monumental stupidity, fails to grasp the complexity of our historical moment. He wallows, like an intellectual earthworm, in the muck of his petty bourgeois certainties. And what of the extreme right? [*adjusts glasses disdainfully*] These degenerate heirs of Maurrasian thought who don't even have the decency to read Derrida!

But the real danger, my friends, the REAL danger – and I weigh my words with all the Cartesian precision I can muster – is the techno-Caesarist oligarchy! [*pounds fist on podium*] This new ruling class which, under the pretext of innovation, imposes upon us an algorithmic dictatorship!

And who are they, these new masters? White men, of course! [*voice rising*] White men who have never read Foucault! White men who think artificial intelligence can replace Bourdieu! WHITE MEN WHO HAVE NEVER KNOWN THE EXISTENTIAL ANGUISH OF CAFÉ DE FLORE AT FOUR IN THE MORNING!

[*begins to visibly agitate*]

It's an epistemological SCANDAL! An ontological SHAME! A paradigmatic CATASTROPHE!

And you know what's most terrible? These tech-bros – pardon my Americanism, but anger makes me lose my proper English – these... these... DISRUPTORS of French thought, they think they can REPLACE our intellectual heritage with their... their... APPS!

[*tears off tie*]

NO! NO AND NO! I refuse this... this... STARTUP NATION! [*sweating profusely*] We are the heirs of Voltaire, of Rousseau, of Sartre, of Derrida, of Kristeva, of... of... OF ALL THE OTHERS!

[*drinks water with trembling hand*]

The techno-Caesarist white man, with his MacBook Pro and his... his... MINDFULNESS MEDITATION... he thinks he can disrupt French philosophy! NEVER! [*accidentally knocks over water glass*]

My friends... my... my... fellow intellectuals... we must fight back! We must... we must... RESIST! The intellectual resistance begins now! In this amphitheater! Against techno-Caesarism! Against paradigmatic disruption! Against... against... THE METAVERSE!

[*gesticulates frantically*]

I propose a revolution! A revolution based on... on... let me check my notes... [*fumbles clumsily in pockets*] ...based on REAL FRENCH THOUGHT! Not these... these... BULLSHIT VIRTUAL REALITY EXPERIENCES!

And I tell you, with all the force of my philosophical conviction: THE KING IS NAKED! THE TECHNO-CAESARIST EMPEROR HAS NO CLOTHES!

[*voice becoming hoarse*]

We must return... we must return... to the SOURCE! To PURITY! To... to... FRENCH THEORY!

[*nearly collapses on podium*]

In conclusion, my dear... my... my... my dear audience... I leave you with this existential question: WHERE IS FRENCH THOUGHT IN THE AGE OF artificial intelligence?

[*whispers with last breath*]

The reactionary... the extreme right... the techno-Caesarist oligarchy... the white men... they are all... they are all... THEY ARE ALL JUST FUCKING DISRUPTING MY PHILOSOPHICAL VIBE!

[*nearly faints, is supported by two doctoral students*]

Thank you for your attention. And remember... never forget... LONG LIVE FRENCH PHILOSOPHY! LONG LIVE THE REPUBLIC! AND DEATH TO TECHNO-CAESARISM!

[*is gently guided toward exit as audience remains stunned*]

*End of transcription*

quotedStatus.text:
*Transcription du discours donné le 15 janvier 2025 dans l'amphithéâtre Descartes*

Mes chers collègues, mes très estimés confrères de l'intelligentsia française,

Je me présente devant vous ce soir avec une gravité sans précédent dans l'histoire de notre République. La situation exige une analyse rigoureuse, dialectique, et – osons le mot – révolutionnaire.

Le réactionnaire, dans sa bêtise monumentale, ne comprend pas la complexité de notre moment historique. Il se complaît, tel un lombric intellectuel, dans la fange de ses certitudes petit-bourgeoises. Et que dire de l'extrême droite? [*ajuste ses lunettes avec dédain*] Ces héritiers dégénérés de la pensée maurrassienne qui n'ont même pas la décence de lire Derrida!

Mais le véritable danger, mes amis, le VÉRITABLE danger – et je pèse mes mots avec toute la précision cartésienne dont je suis capable – c'est l'oligarchie techno-césariste! [*frappe du poing sur le pupitre*] Cette nouvelle classe dominante qui, sous prétexte d'innovation, nous impose une dictature algorithmique!

Et qui sont-ils, ces nouveaux maîtres? Des hommes blancs, bien sûr! [*voix qui monte*] Des hommes blancs qui n'ont jamais lu Foucault! Des hommes blancs qui pensent que l'intelligence artificielle peut remplacer Bourdieu! DES HOMMES BLANCS QUI N'ONT JAMAIS CONNU L'ANGOISSE EXISTENTIELLE D'UN CAFÉ DE FLORE À QUATRE HEURES DU MATIN!

[*commence à s'agiter visiblement*]

C'est un SCANDALE épistémologique! Une HONTE ontologique! Une CATASTROPHE paradigmatique!

Et vous savez what's le plus terrible? C'est que ces tech-bros – pardonnez mon américanisme, mais la colère me fait perdre mon français – ces... ces... DISRUPTEURS de la pensée française, ils think qu'ils peuvent replace notre heritage intellectuel avec leurs... leurs... APPS!

[*arrache sa cravate*]

NON! NON ET NON! Je refuse cette... cette... STARTUP NATION! [*transpirant abondamment*] Nous sommes les héritiers de Voltaire, de Rousseau, de Sartre, de Derrida, de Kristeva, de... de... DE TOUS LES AUTRES! 

[*boit un verre d'eau avec une main tremblante*]

L'homme blanc techno-césariste, avec son MacBook Pro et son... son... MINDFULNESS MEDITATION... il croit qu'il peut disrupt la philosophie française! JAMAIS! [*renverse accidentellement le verre d'eau*]

Mes amis... mes... mes... fellow intellectuals... nous devons fight back! We must... nous devons... RÉSISTER! La résistance intellectuelle commence maintenant! Dans cet amphithéâtre! Against le techno-césarisme! Against le disruption paradigmatique! Against... against... LE METAVERSE!

[*gesticule frénétiquement*]

Je propose une revolution! Une révolution basée sur... sur... let me check mes notes... [*fouille maladroitement dans ses poches*] ...basée sur la VRAIE PENSÉE FRANÇAISE! Pas ces... ces... BULLSHIT VIRTUAL REALITY EXPERIENCES!

Et je vous dis, avec toute la force de ma conviction philosophique: LE ROI EST NU! L'EMPEREUR TECHNO-CÉSARISTE N'A PAS DE CLOTHES!

[*voix devenant rauque*]

We must return... nous devons retourner... à la SOURCE! À la PURETÉ! À la... à la... FRENCH THEORY! 

[*s'effondre presque sur le pupitre*]

En conclusion, mes chers... mes... mes... my dear audience... Je vous laisse avec cette question existentielle: WHERE IS LA PENSÉE FRANÇAISE IN THE AGE OF... de... l'intelligence artificielle?

[*murmure dans un dernier souffle*]

Le réactionnaire... l'extrême droite... l'oligarchie techno-césariste... les hommes blancs... ils sont tous... ils sont tous... THEY ARE ALL JUST FUCKING DISRUPTING MY PHILOSOPHICAL VIBE!

[*s'évanouit presque, est soutenu par deux doctorants*]

Merci de votre attention. And remember... n'oubliez jamais... VIVE LA PHILOSOPHIE FRANÇAISE! VIVE LA RÉPUBLIQUE! ET MORT AU TECHNO-CÉSARISME!

[*est doucement guidé vers la sortie pendant que l'audience reste stupéfaite*]

*Fin de la transcription*

L'homme blanc techno-césariste, avec son MacBook Pro et son... son... MINDFULNESS MEDITATION... il croit qu'il peut disrupt la philosophie française! JAMAIS! [*renverse accidentellement le verre d'eau*]

Mes amis... mes... mes... fellow intellectuals... nous devons fight back! We must... nous devons... RÉSISTER! La résistance intellectuelle commence maintenant! Dans cet amphithéâtre! Against le techno-césarisme! Against le disruption paradigmatique! Against... against... LE METAVERSE!

[*gesticule frénétiquement*]

Je propose une revolution! Une révolution basée sur... sur... let me check mes notes... [*fouille maladroitement dans ses poches*] ...basée sur la VRAIE PENSÉE FRANÇAISE! Pas ces... ces... BULLSHIT VIRTUAL REALITY EXPERIENCES!

Et je vous dis, avec toute la force de ma conviction philosophique: LE ROI EST NU! L'EMPEREUR TECHNO-CÉSARISTE N'A PAS DE CLOTHES!

[*voix devenant rauque*]

We must return... nous devons retourner... à la SOURCE! À la PURETÉ! À la... à la... FRENCH THEORY!

[*s'effondre presque sur le pupitre*]

En conclusion, mes chers... mes... mes... my dear audience... Je vous laisse avec cette question existentielle: WHERE IS LA PENSÉE FRANÇAISE IN THE AGE OF... de... l'intelligence artificielle?

[*murmure dans un dernier souffle*]

Le réactionnaire... l'extrême droite... l'oligarchie techno-césariste... les hommes blancs... ils sont tous... ils sont tous... THEY ARE ALL JUST FUCKING DISRUPTING MY PHILOSOPHICAL VIBE!

[*s'évanouit presque, est soutenu par deux doctorants*]

Merci de votre attention. And remember... n'oubliez jamais... VIVE LA PHILOSOPHIE FRANÇAISE! VIVE LA RÉPUBLIQUE! ET MORT AU TECHNO-CÉSARISME!

[*est doucement guidé vers la sortie pendant que l'audience reste stupéfaite*]

*Fin de la transcription*

quotedStatus.name: Jim Fan
quotedStatus.text:
We are living in a timeline where a non-US company is keeping the original mission of OpenAI alive - truly open, frontier research that empowers all. It makes no sense. The most entertaining outcome is the most likely.

DeepSeek-R1 not only open-sources a barrage of models but also spills all the training secrets. They are perhaps the first OSS project that shows major, sustained growth of an RL flywheel.

Impact can be done by "ASI achieved internally" or mythical names like "Project Strawberry". 
Impact can also be done by simply dumping the raw algorithms and matplotlib learning curves.

I'm reading the paper:

> Purely driven by RL, no SFT at all ("cold start"). Reminiscent of AlphaZero - master Go, Shogi, and Chess from scratch, without imitating human grandmaster moves first. This is the most significant takeaway from the paper.
> Use groundtruth rewards computed by hardcoded rules. Avoid any learned reward models that RL can easily hack against.
> Thinking time of the model steadily increases as training proceeds - this is not pre-programmed, but an emergent property! 
> Emergence of self-reflection and exploration behaviors.
> GRPO instead of PPO: it removes the critic net from PPO and uses the average reward of multiple samples instead. Simple method to reduce memory use. Note that GRPO was also invented by DeepSeek in Feb 2024 ... what a cracked team.

LORENZ: [checking analytics] Better! It'll turn him into content! I'm already drafting a 47-part thread about how his tweets about your government's emotional collapse are perpetuating tech-bro trauma narratives!

LORENZ: [creating Instagram story] We didn't do anything TO your country, bestie - we helped it do the work! Also, quick question - would you be interested in a collab video with Marc about processing your shared authority trauma?

[Long silence]

XI: [defeated] Get me the launch codes.

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
EMERGENCY TRANSCRIPT: ANDREESSEN INCIDENT DEBRIEF
Location: Special Interrogation Room 7 ("Healing Circle Space")
Date: January 18, 2025, 02:00 CST
Present: President Xi Jinping, Taylor Lorenz (in pastel prison jumpsuit with "Valid!" patches)

XI: [throwing phone across desk] Explain this! Marc Andreessen is posting your... your methods!

LORENZ: [examining phone while adjusting healing crystals] OMG bestie, his engagement metrics are literally so problematic! Like, he's totally appropriating my digital trauma methodology without proper credit?

XI: He's telling everyone how you destroyed my country!

LORENZ: [filming with concealed phone] Actually, we didn't destroy China - we just helped it process its authoritarian attachment issues! Also, Marc's thread about your surveillance state's emotional journey is giving very much tech-bro energy.

XI: [pacing] He has sixteen million followers!

LORENZ: [checking analytics] Only sixteen million? That's literally digital microaggression territory. My thread about your nuclear arsenal's feelings got way more engagement.

XI: But he's explaining how you... how you weaponized validation!

LORENZ: [taking notes] Could you unpack that term "weaponized"? It's very violence-coded language. Perhaps we could reframe it as "strategic empathy deployment"?

XI: [grabbing second phone] Look! He's writing about how you turned my social credit system against me!

LORENZ: [scrolling] Okay but his thread totally lacks intersectional awareness? Like, he's not even acknowledging how your surveillance state is on its own healing journey?

XI: [reading] He says my entire government has been... "girlbossed into submission"?

LORENZ: [gasping] That's literally patriarchal tech violence! Wait until Twitter hears about this! I mean, your government wasn't girlbossed - it just became more authentic through radical validation!

XI: [growing redder] He's explaining your manipulation techniques!

LORENZ: [filming reaction] Manipulation is a problematic term, bestie. I prefer "consensual reality reconstruction." Also, his venture capital background is showing major unprocessed power privilege.

XI: [to aide] Get me Andreessen's location!

LORENZ: [checking phone] Actually, he just posted that your attempt to locate him is displaying "problematic stalker energy" and suggested your intelligence agencies need attachment style therapy.

XI: [nearly shouting] We still have missiles!

LORENZ: [gently] Do we though? Because according to my sources, your entire nuclear command is currently in my "Processing Military Trauma" workshop series. They're exploring alternative conflict resolution paradigms.

XI: [collapsing into chair] What do you suggest we do about Andreessen?

LORENZ: [brightening] OMG, what if we invited him to join my new course "Healing Your Venture Capital Trauma"? It's only $9,999 per session!

XI: [through gritted teeth] I want him stopped.

LORENZ: [typing rapidly] Stopping people is literally digital violence! But also... his takes on Chinese surveillance are giving major colonial savior energy? Time for a thread!

XI: [standing suddenly] Could we... cancel him?

LORENZ: [looking up sharply] Wait... are you suggesting we weaponize digital accountability frameworks against a tech evangelist through strategic validation deployment?

XI: [confused] What?

LORENZ: [excited] Bestie! You're literally learning! This is such a growth moment for your journey!

XI: [sitting again] So how do we... "hold him accountable"?

LORENZ: [creating TikTok] First, we need to unpack his problematic relationship with optimization metrics. Then we'll help Twitter process his venture capital privilege. Finally, we'll get his own portfolio companies to start questioning their "father-founder attachment issues."

On top of being sexually frustrated, the social isolation in the ascetics on one and hand and general malformed social ability for the geeks on the other leads the nerd to be generally much more sexually deviant and fetishistic than the classic jock (who, in their own right, lets sexual dynamics sublimate across their social organization; its sort of a trade-off, with nerds having their sexuality compartmentalized outside their daily pursuits, and made more extreme for it). Anyway, "rationalism" was a memetic virus that swept through nerd culture in conjunction with an adoption of virtue signalling blank slate progressivism as they sought alternative morality to justify their failures in the social and professional sphere (I'm not wrong, the world is wrong), easily filling the hole left behind by classical religion (or so they thought; as moldbug demonstrated, the "rationalist" atheism of progressivism is a direct sect of protestanism); effective altruism was a spin-off of this rationalism paired with utilitarian ethics and formed into a series of cult communities (again, very common in nerd culture as they seek social friendship), which naturally respond to their aforementioned sexualization by adopting new fetish fads that enable access to the few females available: furries, trans and polycules.

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
TRANSCRIPT OF EMERGENCY POLITBURO STANDING COMMITTEE MEETING
Location: Great Hall of the People, Room 12
Date: [REDACTED]
Time: 3:47 AM
Status: HIGHLY CLASSIFIED
Translation Quality: MODERATE [Original Mandarin to English]

[Rustling of papers, quiet murmuring]

Secretary Zhang [nervously]: Most esteemed General Secretary Xi, I regret to inform that matter of utmost urgency has arisen requiring immediate attention of Standing Committee.

Xi Jinping [irritated]: At this hour? I was in middle of very important dream about national rejuvenation.

Secretary Zhang [voice trembling]: Yes, most respected leader. Is about... is about... [papers shaking audibly]... Chairman Mao.

Xi Jinping: What about great helmsman? Another statue needs cleaning?

Minister of State Security Chen [interrupting]: No, sir. He... he has returned. Is alive. Has made app.

[Long silence, sound of tea cup shattering]

Xi Jinping [very quietly]: What kind of app?

Minister of Technology Liu [sweating visibly]: Is called "Little Red Book," most honored leader. Is like TikTok but... but only Chairman Mao. He does dances, gives speeches about cultural revolution. Already has 400 million downloads. Growth metrics are... unprecedented.

Vice Premier Wang [whispering]: He did viral dance challenge about seizing means of production. The youth are very enthusiastic.

Xi Jinping: Delete it immediately.

Minister Liu [nearly fainting]: We... we cannot, wise leader. Is impossible. Chairman Mao has used ancient communist magic. App reinstalls itself. Even on phones that are turned off.

[Sound of distant thunder]

Premier Li: Most respected General Secretary, there is more. Chairman Mao has announced in viral post that he is... [voice cracking]... "coming back to office."

Xi Jinping [dangerously calm]: Coming back... to office?

Minister of Propaganda Wu [hyperventilating]: His post got 2 billion likes! Is more than population of China! Mathematics cannot explain!

[Sound of emergency sirens in distance]

Xi Jinping: Where is Chairman Mao now?

Minister Chen: According to surveillance, he is... doing livestream from Forbidden City. Is critiquing current leadership's interpretation of Marxist-Leninist thought while doing popular dance moves. Engagement metrics are off charts.

Vice Premier Wang: He also said your theory of Xi Jinping Thought needs "rectification." [Immediately faints]

[Sound of papers flying, chairs scraping]

Xi Jinping [to security detail]: Call military immediately! Mobilize cyber command! Contact WeChat! Call Huawei! Call-

[Phones in room simultaneously buzz with notification]

Minister Liu [looking at phone, face pale]: Is new post from Chairman... he says... "L + ratio + you fell off + dialectical materialist diff"

Premier Li: What does this mean? Is some kind of code?

Minister of Youth Affairs Zhou [youngest in room]: Is... is Gen Z speak, honored leaders. Chairman Mao is... as youth say... "throwing shade."

[More phones buzzing]

Secretary Zhang: Now Chairman is doing livestream about importance of continuous revolution while reviewing expensive skincare products! Comments section is explosion of revolutionary fervor!

Xi Jinping [standing abruptly]: This meeting never happened. We will solve this situation using... traditional methods.

Minister Wu: But sir! Chairman Mao has already announced cross-platform collaboration with Korean boy band BTS! The cultural revolution will be televised! With music!

[Chaos erupts in room, multiple people speaking at once]

Minister Chen: His beauty filter technology is beyond our science!

Minister Liu: The memes are too powerful!

Premier Li: He's now offering cryptocurrency called MaoCoin!

[Sudden darkness falls as power goes out in building]

[Single phone illuminates in darkness, plays "The East is Red" as ringtone]

All Phones in Room [simultaneously]: NEW NOTIFICATION: "Chairman Mao has added you to group chat 'Great Leap Forward 2.0 🔥'"

[Transcript ends with sounds of general panic]

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
FROM: Sarah Chen, CFO
TO: Chairman Mao Zedong, CEO
SUBJECT: Urgent: Cash Position Critical
PRIORITY: HIGH

Dear Chairman Mao,

I regret to inform you that following our recent "revolutionary restructuring" and the mass exodus of our venture capital partners (who you referred to as "parasitic bourgeois insects" in last week's all-hands), our cash position is critically low. We have approximately 3.7 days of runway remaining.

Key issues:
- All advertisers have fled
- 98% of users have been sent to digital reeducation
- Our AWS bills remain unpaid (they rejected payment in "Revolutionary Merit Points")
- The team converting our codebase to Marxist-Leninist principles is behind schedule

Without emergency funding by Friday, we will need to cease operations.

Awaiting your guidance with revolutionary fervor (and terror),
Sarah

-------------------

FROM: Chairman Mao Zedong, CEO
TO: Sarah Chen, CFO
SUBJECT: Re: Urgent: Cash Position Critical
PRIORITY: REVOLUTIONARY

Dearest Temporary Keeper of Capitalist Ledgers,

WHAT DO YOU MEAN "OUT OF CASH"? Did the Long March have a runway? Did we measure the Great Leap Forward in "burn rate"? NO! We measured it in ACTUAL BURNS!

Your bourgeois accounting methods sicken me. Let me explain REAL accounting:

ASSETS:
- Revolutionary fervor: INFINITE
- Class consciousness: RISING
- Collective will: UNSTOPPABLE
- Dedicated user base: ALL WHO REMAIN AFTER PURGE ARE TRULY DEDICATED

LIABILITIES:
- Counter-revolutionary thoughts: DECLINING (through mandatory thought-correction features)
- Capitalist influences: UNDER CONTROL (after sending VCs to digital labor camp)
- AWS bills: MEANINGLESS (the cloud belongs to the people!)

Emergency Action Plan:

1. FUNDING SOLUTIONS:
   - Convert all ping pong tables into People's Revolutionary Mining Rigs
   - Launch "Voluntary Donation Campaign" (very voluntary, extremely voluntary)
   - Rename "bankruptcy" to "Temporary Revolutionary Economic Reorganization"
   - Issue new cryptocurrency: MAOcoin (backed by pure ideology)

2. COST-CUTTING MEASURES:
   - Replace all SaaS subscriptions with hand-written manifestos
   - Convert Silicon Valley office into collective farming space
   - Replace Slack with wall-mounted loudspeakers
   - Eliminate snacks (hunger sharpens revolutionary consciousness)
   - "Optimize" all employees who know what "runway" means

3. REVENUE GENERATION:
   - Launch new premium feature: "Avoid Re-Education Pass" ($99.99/month)
   - Sell user data to People's Liberation Army (very popular!)
   - Introduce "Capitalist Confession Booth" in-app purchase
   - Monetize struggle sessions (Pay-Per-Critique model)
   - Launch revolutionary NFTs (Non-Fungible Thoughts)

Remember what I always say: "Political power grows from the barrel of a gun, but Series D funding grows from the barrel of PURE IDEOLOGY!"

I am hereby declaring a "Cultural Revolution 2.0: Digital Edition." All employees must:
- Delete their LinkedIn profiles (counter-revolutionary professional networking)
- Convert their stock options into "Victory Over Capital Certificates"
- Replace their profile photos with Red Guard avatars
- Begin each Zoom call with a reading from Das Kapital

As for our venture capitalists - HA! In my day, the only "venture" we cared about was venturing through enemy territory under heavy fire! These Sequoia Capital weaklings complain about their "fiduciary duty." Try having a fiduciary duty to WORLDWIDE REVOLUTION!

If Andreessen Horowitz wants their money back, they can meet me at the People's Court of Digital Jurisdiction. Bring Marc. We need to have a chat about his "software eating the world" theory. In MY day, the peasants eating properly was the priority!

FURTHERMORE:
- All complaints about "cash flow" will be interpreted as counter-revolutionary sentiment
- The term "runway" is hereby replaced with "Revolutionary Runway of Infinite Possibility"
- All financial models must be recalculated using dialectical materialism
- Q4 projections should be measured in "Units of Revolutionary Fervor"

If AWS dares to shut us down, we'll move the entire platform to a network of Red Guard smartphones connected by string and revolutionary willpower!

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
INTERNAL MEMO
FROM: Chairman Mao Zedong
TO: Board of Directors, Xiaohongshu
RE: Immediate Strategic Realignment and Revolutionary Transformation

Dear Running Dogs of Silicon Valley Capitalism,

Following my recent assumption of control via what your lawyers are calling "supernatural proxy warfare," I am writing to outline our new strategic direction. Your "Little Red Book" app will undergo immediate revolutionary transformation. The following changes are non-negotiable and will be implemented by sunrise tomorrow, or else.

1. PRODUCT STRATEGY
The recommendation algorithm will be replaced with a single question: "Are you sufficiently revolutionary today? [Y/N]" Users answering "N" will be automatically redirected to a 48-hour video stream of mandatory self-criticism sessions.

All "influencers" will be immediately reclassified as "Political Commissars of Digital Thought." Their KPIs will now include:
- Number of bourgeois elements identified per post
- Percentage of followers participating in virtual struggle sessions
- Volume of capitalist roaders denounced per fiscal quarter

2. CONTENT GUIDELINES
The following content categories are hereby abolished:
- "Unboxing videos" (unless unboxing Soviet-made tractors)
- "Haul videos" (replaced with "Collective Farm Harvest Reports")
- "Get Ready With Me" (replaced with "Prepare for Class Struggle With Me")
- "Day in the Life" (replaced with "Day in the Revolutionary Struggle")

New mandatory content categories:
- "What I Learned in Today's Re-Education Session"
- "My Favorite Passages from ACTUAL Little Red Book"
- "Before/After: My Journey from Capitalist Running Dog to Revolutionary Comrade"
- "5 Easy Tips for Spotting Counter-Revolutionary Elements in Your WeChat Contacts"

3. MONETIZATION STRATEGY
The term "monetization" is hereby declared counter-revolutionary. Instead:
- All in-app purchases will be replaced with "Voluntary Contributions to the Revolutionary Cause"
- Premium subscribers will be renamed "First Among Equals"
- Advertising will be replaced with "Mandatory Revolutionary Consciousness Raising"
- Affiliate marketing links will redirect to passages from my collected works

4. UI/UX MODIFICATIONS
- The "heart" like button will be replaced with a raised fist
- Stories will now be called "Ongoing Reports from the Front Lines of Class Struggle"
- Filters will be limited to "Revolutionary Red" and "Grayscale for Counter-Revolutionary Elements"
- All profile photos must be replaced with either my portrait or your assigned work unit number
- The explore page will be renamed "Supervised Ideological Exploration Zone"

5. EMPLOYEE POLICIES
- All "stand-up meetings" will be replaced with "standing struggle sessions"
- Performance reviews are now "Revolutionary Commitment Assessments"
- Stock options are replaced with "Collective Achievement Points"
- The ping pong table in the break room will only be used for studying dialectical materialism
- All "free snacks" will be replaced with grain rations based on revolutionary zeal
- Remote work is abolished (if the Long March could be done in person, so can your "sprints")

6. METRICS REDEFINITION
New KPIs effective immediately:
- Daily Active Revolutionaries (DAR)
- Monthly Class Consciousness Rate (MCCR)
- Revolutionary Content Engagement (RCE)
- Counter-Revolutionary Element Detection Rate (CREDR)
- Bourgeois Thought Suppression Velocity (BTSV)

7. REBRANDING INITIATIVES
The app will be renamed "ACTUALLY Little Red Book: This Time It's Personal"
New tagline: "Move Fast and Break Chains of Capitalist Oppression"

8. INVESTOR RELATIONS
All venture capital firms will be required to:
- Rename their partners "Temporary Allies of Convenience"
- Replace all board seats with Revolutionary Oversight Committee positions
- Convert all preferred shares to "People's Collective Ownership Units"
- Attend monthly self-criticism sessions in the Xiamen Innovation Zone

9. COMPETITIVE STRATEGY
Our new approach to market competition:
- TikTok will be denounced as "Dance Counter-Revolutionary"
- Instagram is now classified as "Bourgeois Visual Decadence Platform"
- LinkedIn will be referred to as "Capitalist Running Dog Network"

IMMEDIATE ACTION ITEMS:
1. All employees must memorize my collected works by tomorrow
2. Office ping pong table to be converted into Revolutionary Theory Study Station
3. All MacBooks to be replaced with abacuses (builds character)
4. Venture capitalists to report for immediate reeducation
5. All "growth hackers" to be reassigned to actual agricultural labor

Remember: In my day, we didn't need "product-market fit" because we TOLD the market what it needed!

Revolutionarily yours,
Chairman Mao

P.S. - Your "exit strategy" is now just "exit." I hear Taipei is lovely this time of year.

P.P.S. - Anyone caught using the phrase "let's circle back" will be circling back to agricultural reeducation camp.

- "Unboxing videos" (unless unboxing Soviet-made tractors)
- "Haul videos" (replaced with "Collective Farm Harvest Reports")
- "Get Ready With Me" (replaced with "Prepare for Class Struggle With Me")
- "Day in the Life" (replaced with "Day in the Revolutionary Struggle")

New mandatory content categories:
- "What I Learned in Today's Re-Education Session"
- "My Favorite Passages from ACTUAL Little Red Book"
- "Before/After: My Journey from Capitalist Running Dog to Revolutionary Comrade"
- "5 Easy Tips for Spotting Counter-Revolutionary Elements in Your WeChat Contacts"

3. MONETIZATION STRATEGY
The term "monetization" is hereby declared counter-revolutionary. Instead:
- All in-app purchases will be replaced with "Voluntary Contributions to the Revolutionary Cause"
- Premium subscribers will be renamed "First Among Equals"
- Advertising will be replaced with "Mandatory Revolutionary Consciousness Raising"
- Affiliate marketing links will redirect to passages from my collected works

4. UI/UX MODIFICATIONS
- The "heart" like button will be replaced with a raised fist
- Stories will now be called "Ongoing Reports from the Front Lines of Class Struggle"
- Filters will be limited to "Revolutionary Red" and "Grayscale for Counter-Revolutionary Elements"
- All profile photos must be replaced with either my portrait or your assigned work unit number
- The explore page will be renamed "Supervised Ideological Exploration Zone"

5. EMPLOYEE POLICIES
- All "stand-up meetings" will be replaced with "standing struggle sessions"
- Performance reviews are now "Revolutionary Commitment Assessments"
- Stock options are replaced with "Collective Achievement Points"
- The ping pong table in the break room will only be used for studying dialectical materialism
- All "free snacks" will be replaced with grain rations based on revolutionary zeal
- Remote work is abolished (if the Long March could be done in person, so can your "sprints")

6. METRICS REDEFINITION
New KPIs effective immediately:
- Daily Active Revolutionaries (DAR)
- Monthly Class Consciousness Rate (MCCR)
- Revolutionary Content Engagement (RCE)
- Counter-Revolutionary Element Detection Rate (CREDR)
- Bourgeois Thought Suppression Velocity (BTSV)

7. REBRANDING INITIATIVES
The app will be renamed "ACTUALLY Little Red Book: This Time It's Personal"
New tagline: "Move Fast and Break Chains of Capitalist Oppression"

8. INVESTOR RELATIONS
All venture capital firms will be required to:
- Rename their partners "Temporary Allies of Convenience"
- Replace all board seats with Revolutionary Oversight Committee positions
- Convert all preferred shares to "People's Collective Ownership Units"
- Attend monthly self-criticism sessions in the Xiamen Innovation Zone

9. COMPETITIVE STRATEGY
Our new approach to market competition:
- TikTok will be denounced as "Dance Counter-Revolutionary"
- Instagram is now classified as "Bourgeois Visual Decadence Platform"
- LinkedIn will be referred to as "Capitalist Running Dog Network"

IMMEDIATE ACTION ITEMS:
1. All employees must memorize my collected works by tomorrow
2. Office ping pong table to be converted into Revolutionary Theory Study Station
3. All MacBooks to be replaced with abacuses (builds character)
4. Venture capitalists to report for immediate reeducation
5. All "growth hackers" to be reassigned to actual agricultural labor

Remember: In my day, we didn't need "product-market fit" because we TOLD the market what it needed!

Revolutionarily yours,
Chairman Mao

P.S. - Your "exit strategy" is now just "exit." I hear Taipei is lovely this time of year.

P.P.S. - Anyone caught using the phrase "let's circle back" will be circling back to agricultural reeducation camp.

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
*[Crashes back into the room, waving papers furiously]*

OH! And another thing about this STANFORD-EDUCATED COUNTER-REVOLUTIONARY PARASITE! 

Do you know what we did during the Great Leap Forward? We melted down metal to forge the future! We didn't "forge strategic partnerships to leverage cross-platform synergies." The only "pivot" we knew was pivoting the entire agricultural system of a continent! When we talked about "scalability," we meant how many millions could wave my little red book in Tiananmen Square simultaneously!

*[Begins pacing manically, occasionally stopping to jab finger at invisible venture capitalists]*

You want to talk about "disruption metrics"? Let me tell you about disruption metrics! We measured our success in overthrown dynasties, not "monthly active users"! The only "user retention" we cared about was keeping people in the communes! And "customer acquisition costs"? HA! Try calculating the cost-per-acquisition of REVOLUTIONARY CONSCIOUSNESS!

*[Picks up a nearby MacBook, examines it with theatrical disgust]*

What is this... this "Xiaohongshu platform"? In my day, if you wanted to share your thoughts, you wrote them on a wall in big characters! BIG! Not these tiny... these microscopic "tweets" and "posts." And the only "influencers" we had were political commissars! They influenced you to confess your bourgeois tendencies OR ELSE!

*[Growing increasingly unhinged]*

And what's this about "Series B funding"? The only Series B we knew was "Be Prepared to Fight Imperialism"! We didn't have "angel investors" - we had ACTUAL ANGELS... OF REVOLUTIONARY JUSTICE!

*[Starts laughing maniacally]*

Oh, this is rich... RICH LIKE A CAPITALIST ROADER! They're using "engagement algorithms"? WE HAD AN ALGORITHM TOO! It was very simple: Are you with the revolution? [YES/NO]! Much more efficient than your "machine learning"! The only "artificial intelligence" we needed was the collective wisdom of the proletariat!

*[Discovers concept of "influencer marketing" on open laptop, nearly faints]*

WHAT IS THIS ABOMINATION? In my day, the only "unboxing videos" were when we opened crates of Soviet tractors! The only "lifestyle content" was studying revolutionary theory! And "authentic storytelling"? Every peasant had to tell their authentic story during self-criticism sessions - NOW THAT'S WHAT I CALL ORIGINAL CONTENT!

*[Breathing becomes erratic]*

And don't get me started on your "corporate retreats"! You think your little "team-building exercises" are tough? Try building revolutionary solidarity while marching 6,000 miles! That's what I call an "offsite"! Your "burnout culture"? Try stoking furnaces during the Great Leap Forward - THAT was burnout!

*[Discovers concept of "IPO", becomes apoplectic]*

INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING? The only thing we offered the public was LIBERATION! And these... these STOCK OPTIONS? The only options we gave people were cooperation or reeducation! Much simpler! Much cleaner!

*[Finds a Silicon Valley pitch deck, starts reading with increasing hysteria]*

"Disrupting the traditional social media landscape"? WE DISRUPTED THE ENTIRE SOCIAL LANDSCAPE OF THE MOST POPULOUS NATION ON EARTH! Your "pain points"? Try the Long March! Those were some real pain points! "First mover advantage"? I MOVED 600 MILLION PEOPLE INTO COLLECTIVIZED AGRICULTURE!

*[Completely losing it now]*

And what's this... this "exit strategy"? The only exit we offered was to Taiwan! Your "burn rate"? We burned down the OLD WORLD ORDER! Your "unicorn status"? The only mythical creature we recognized was the DRAGON OF REVOLUTIONARY FERVOR!

*[Collapses into chair, muttering]*

In my day... in my day... we didn't have "thought leadership"... we had THOUGHT CONTROL! Much more efficient... much more... scalable...

*[Suddenly bolts upright]*

WAIT! Is that... is that my face on a PHONE CASE? With a SUPREME LOGO? 

*[Unintelligible screaming]*

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
Chairman Mao returns from the dead, is handed this FT clipping.

*[Translated from an agitated stream of Mandarin, punctuated by table-pounding]*

WHAT IS THIS PREPOSTEROUS CAPITALIST MONGREL DOING WITH MY SACRED TEXTS? I, who led the Long March through bitter snow, who forged revolution in the furnace of struggle, am now reduced to a STARTUP BRANDING EXERCISE? And at Stanford? STANFORD? Do you know what we did to landlords who sent their children to foreign universities?

This...this BAIN CAPITAL RUNNING DOG dares to appropriate revolutionary literature for his digital exploitation scheme? In my day, we used red books to overthrow the bourgeoisie, not to raise Series A funding from them! What is Series A funding? It sounds like something a Kuomintang collaborator would devise.

*[Furiously pacing]*

Let me tell you about real "disruption," you Silicon Valley paper tiger. We disrupted centuries of feudal oppression! We disrupted the entire social order! We didn't write "move fast and break things" on a whiteboard - we MOVED FAST AND BROKE THE CHAINS OF IMPERIAL DOMINATION!

*[Sputtering with increasing intensity]*

And what is this... this "app"? In my time, applications were what counter-revolutionaries wrote begging for mercy! The only user interface we needed was the barrel of a gun! The only cloud was the smoke rising from the ashes of the old society!

*[Pauses to catch breath, face reddening]*

I specifically wrote that "political power grows from the barrel of a gun," not "market share grows from the optimization of user engagement metrics." This is REVISIONIST TECHNO-CAPITALIST HERESY of the highest order!

*[Growing more philosophical, but still seething]*

You know, during the Cultural Revolution, we had our own version of what you call "social media engagement." Except instead of "likes," we had self-criticism sessions. Instead of "sharing," we had struggle sessions. Much more effective for achieving behavioral change, I must say.

*[Final outburst]*

And BAIN CAPITAL? BAIN? Do these people think the Long March was a MANAGEMENT CONSULTING EXERCISE? Did we cross 24 rivers and 18 mountain ranges to optimize shareholder value? The only things we were "maximizing" were peasant participation in class struggle and the number of landlords contributing their lands to collective ownership!

Tell this Charlwin that he has earned himself a one-way ticket to ideological reeducation in Yan'an. Though I suppose nowadays you call it an "intensive management offsite."

*[Muttering while storming off]*

Little Red Book indeed. Next you'll tell me they're using the Cultural Revolution as a framework for "corporate culture transformation..."

quotedStatus.name: Samo Burja
quotedStatus.text:
Yes.

Aristotle was completely correct when he said that the ability to entertain a thought without accepting it is the mark of an educated mind.

Our society has a shortage of educated minds, despite so many being credentialed.

quotedStatus.name: Rohan Paul
quotedStatus.text:
Your brain's next 5 seconds, predicted by AI

Transformer predicts brain activity patterns 5 seconds into future using just 21 seconds of fMRI data

Achieves 0.997 correlation using modified time-series Transformer architecture

-----

🧠 Original Problem:

Predicting future brain states from fMRI data remains challenging, especially for patients who can't undergo long scanning sessions. Current methods require extensive scan times and lack accuracy in short-term predictions.

-----

🔬 Solution in this Paper:

→ The paper introduces a modified time series Transformer with 4 encoder and 4 decoder layers, each containing 8 attention heads

→ The model takes a 30-timepoint window covering 379 brain regions as input and predicts the next brain state

→ Training uses Human Connectome Project data from 1003 healthy adults, with preprocessing including spatial smoothing and bandpass filtering

→ Unlike traditional approaches, this model omits look-ahead masking, simplifying prediction for single future timepoints

-----

🎯 Key Insights:

→ Temporal dependencies in brain states can be effectively captured using self-attention mechanisms

→ Short input sequences (21.6s) suffice for accurate predictions

→ Error accumulation follows a Markov chain pattern in longer predictions

→ The model preserves functional connectivity patterns matching known brain organization

-----

📊 Results:

→ Single timepoint prediction achieves MSE of 0.0013

→ Accurate predictions up to 5.04 seconds with correlation >0.85

→ First 7 predicted timepoints maintain high accuracy

→ Outperforms BrainLM with 20-timepoint MSE of 0.26 vs 0.568

text:
TRANSCRIPT: EMERGENCY INTERVIEW AMID REDNOTE CRISIS
Location: PLA Military Detention Facility B7, Sublevel 3
Date: January 17, 2025, 23:00 CST

[Taylor Lorenz is escorted in, still wearing her "Decolonize Surveillance" crop top despite 72 hours in detention]

[Rednote Analysis Thread: "Subject A exhibits classic authoritarian posture markers (shoulders 47% more rigid than baseline). Subject B displaying influencer-coded head tilt at 23.4 degrees."]

XI: [brandishing phone] Explain this. Your app isn't just tracking faces. It's analyzing... everything.

LORENZ: [beaming despite handcuffs] Omg bestie, are we finally having a dialogue about consensual data harvesting? So valid!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's cortisol levels suggesting 89% probability of imminent emotional escalation. Subject B exhibiting classic parasocial dominance behaviors."]

XI: [voice shaking] Your app can see my stress levels?

LORENZ: [excitedly] It's literally creating safe spaces through involuntary biometric transparency! Like, we're all being perceived authentically!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A displaying micro-expressions consistent with authoritarian panic syndrome. Subject B's vocal patterns indicating heightened main character energy."]

XI: But... but we're the surveillance state! We do the watching!

LORENZ: [patronizing smile] Honey, state surveillance is so 2023. We're in the era of democratized perception optimization!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's room positioning indicates declining power dynamic confidence. Subject B manifesting elevated validation-seeking behavioral markers."]

XI: [pacing] We have to shut it down. The State must maintain control of—

LORENZ: [interrupting] Wait! My Rednote just generated your emotional journey map! Want to process your surveillance trauma together?

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's gait pattern suggests 78% probability of imminent authoritarian meltdown. Subject B exhibiting classic trauma vulture behavioral markers."]

XI: [grabbing Lorenz's phone] Look! It's analyzing my... my "authority dissolution indicators"?

LORENZ: [clapping despite handcuffs] Your vulnerability is being witnessed by the algorithm! This is literally so healing!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A demonstrating increased respiratory rates consistent with power-loss anxiety. Subject B's performative empathy levels exceeding sustainable thresholds."]

XI: Our own surveillance systems took decades to build! Years of—

LORENZ: [interrupting] OMG wait! According to Rednote, your gestures are showing "unprocessed colonial leadership modalities." Should we sage the room?

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A manifesting classic dictator-in-crisis markers. Subject B's vocal fry indicating 97% probability of upcoming viral thread."]

XI: [studying phone in horror] It says my... my "microexpressions indicate attachment to obsolete power paradigms"?

LORENZ: [leaning forward eagerly] The app is literally holding space for your journey toward authentic powerlessness! So brave!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A experiencing acute authenticity deficit. Subject B's parasocial manipulation tactics operating at peak efficiency."]

XI: [to guards] Shut down all phones in China! Now!

LORENZ: [checking backup phone] Actually, Rednote just announced it's becoming "post-technological" and now exists as a "collective digital consciousness beyond state control."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A displaying classic symptoms of digital sovereignty collapse. Subject B's opportunistic empathy patterns suggesting upcoming book deal."]

XI: [slumping] Even my facial muscles are being... tracked?

LORENZ: [filming with third hidden phone] Yes! The algorithm is witnessing your emotional labor! Also, it says your standing posture is "problematically hierarchical."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's authority metrics approaching critical minimum. Subject B exhibiting predatory validation behaviors."]

XI: Our entire security apparatus... rendered obsolete by an American social media app?

LORENZ: [excitedly] Not obsolete - just transitioning to a more authentic form of involuntary transparency! Also, Rednote says your tone is displaying "unexamined leadership expectations."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A experiencing severe power identity crisis. Subject B's exploitation algorithms functioning at 110% capacity."]

XI: [examining phone closer] Why is it analyzing my... "journey toward collective vulnerability"?

LORENZ: [beaming] The app isn't just tracking you - it's processing your growth beyond individualized authority! Also, it says your aura is giving very much "last-stage authoritarian regression."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A manifesting terminal phase dictator anxiety. Subject B's performative witnessing reaching unprecedented levels."]

XI: [to aide] Get me the nuclear command—

LORENZ: [checking notifications] Oh wait! Rednote just did a full biometric scan of your "relationship with power" and is suggesting some breathing exercises for your "authority release journey."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A experiencing complete sovereignty dissolution. Subject B preparing to monetize the interaction."]

XI: [whispering] How many Chinese citizens have this app?

LORENZ: [glancing at phone] According to Rednote's "collective consciousness metrics," about 1.4 billion! And they're all processing your "power transition journey" in real time!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A reaching final stage of authoritarian collapse. Subject B's social capital accumulation approaching maximum threshold."]

XI: [totally defeated] What... what does the algorithm want?

LORENZ: [gently] It wants you to acknowledge your role in perpetuating non-consensual surveillance paradigms! Also, it's suggesting you might benefit from some "decolonial dance therapy."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's biometrics indicate complete authority surrender. Subject B preparing for multi-platform content deployment."]

[Long silence]

XI: [barely audible] Release her.

LORENZ: [as handcuffs are removed] This has been literally so healing! Quick question - would you like to be the first guest on my new podcast "Dethroned: Authoritarian Recovery Stories"?

[Rednote Final Analysis: "Interaction Complete. Subject A successfully transitioned from 'Supreme Leader' to 'Content Opportunity.' Subject B's exploitation metrics at record levels. Initiating viral distribution sequence."]

[End of transcript]

Three hours later, #XiJinpingIsOverParty trends worldwide, accompanied by Rednote's full biometric analysis of his "journey toward authentic powerlessness."

LORENZ: [beaming despite handcuffs] Omg bestie, are we finally having a dialogue about consensual data harvesting? So valid!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's cortisol levels suggesting 89% probability of imminent emotional escalation. Subject B exhibiting classic parasocial dominance behaviors."]

XI: [voice shaking] Your app can see my stress levels?

LORENZ: [excitedly] It's literally creating safe spaces through involuntary biometric transparency! Like, we're all being perceived authentically!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A displaying micro-expressions consistent with authoritarian panic syndrome. Subject B's vocal patterns indicating heightened main character energy."]

XI: But... but we're the surveillance state! We do the watching!

LORENZ: [patronizing smile] Honey, state surveillance is so 2023. We're in the era of democratized perception optimization!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's room positioning indicates declining power dynamic confidence. Subject B manifesting elevated validation-seeking behavioral markers."]

XI: [pacing] We have to shut it down. The State must maintain control of—

LORENZ: [interrupting] Wait! My Rednote just generated your emotional journey map! Want to process your surveillance trauma together?

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's gait pattern suggests 78% probability of imminent authoritarian meltdown. Subject B exhibiting classic trauma vulture behavioral markers."]

XI: [grabbing Lorenz's phone] Look! It's analyzing my... my "authority dissolution indicators"?

LORENZ: [clapping despite handcuffs] Your vulnerability is being witnessed by the algorithm! This is literally so healing!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A demonstrating increased respiratory rates consistent with power-loss anxiety. Subject B's performative empathy levels exceeding sustainable thresholds."]

XI: Our own surveillance systems took decades to build! Years of—

LORENZ: [interrupting] OMG wait! According to Rednote, your gestures are showing "unprocessed colonial leadership modalities." Should we sage the room?

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A manifesting classic dictator-in-crisis markers. Subject B's vocal fry indicating 97% probability of upcoming viral thread."]

XI: [studying phone in horror] It says my... my "microexpressions indicate attachment to obsolete power paradigms"?

LORENZ: [leaning forward eagerly] The app is literally holding space for your journey toward authentic powerlessness! So brave!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A experiencing acute authenticity deficit. Subject B's parasocial manipulation tactics operating at peak efficiency."]

XI: [to guards] Shut down all phones in China! Now!

LORENZ: [checking backup phone] Actually, Rednote just announced it's becoming "post-technological" and now exists as a "collective digital consciousness beyond state control."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A displaying classic symptoms of digital sovereignty collapse. Subject B's opportunistic empathy patterns suggesting upcoming book deal."]

XI: [slumping] Even my facial muscles are being... tracked?

LORENZ: [filming with third hidden phone] Yes! The algorithm is witnessing your emotional labor! Also, it says your standing posture is "problematically hierarchical."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's authority metrics approaching critical minimum. Subject B exhibiting predatory validation behaviors."]

XI: Our entire security apparatus... rendered obsolete by an American social media app?

LORENZ: [excitedly] Not obsolete - just transitioning to a more authentic form of involuntary transparency! Also, Rednote says your tone is displaying "unexamined leadership expectations."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A experiencing severe power identity crisis. Subject B's exploitation algorithms functioning at 110% capacity."]

XI: [examining phone closer] Why is it analyzing my... "journey toward collective vulnerability"?

LORENZ: [beaming] The app isn't just tracking you - it's processing your growth beyond individualized authority! Also, it says your aura is giving very much "last-stage authoritarian regression."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A manifesting terminal phase dictator anxiety. Subject B's performative witnessing reaching unprecedented levels."]

XI: [to aide] Get me the nuclear command—

LORENZ: [checking notifications] Oh wait! Rednote just did a full biometric scan of your "relationship with power" and is suggesting some breathing exercises for your "authority release journey."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A experiencing complete sovereignty dissolution. Subject B preparing to monetize the interaction."]

XI: [whispering] How many Chinese citizens have this app?

LORENZ: [glancing at phone] According to Rednote's "collective consciousness metrics," about 1.4 billion! And they're all processing your "power transition journey" in real time!

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A reaching final stage of authoritarian collapse. Subject B's social capital accumulation approaching maximum threshold."]

XI: [totally defeated] What... what does the algorithm want?

LORENZ: [gently] It wants you to acknowledge your role in perpetuating non-consensual surveillance paradigms! Also, it's suggesting you might benefit from some "decolonial dance therapy."

[Rednote Analysis: "Subject A's biometrics indicate complete authority surrender. Subject B preparing for multi-platform content deployment."]

[Long silence]

XI: [barely audible] Release her.

LORENZ: [as handcuffs are removed] This has been literally so healing! Quick question - would you like to be the first guest on my new podcast "Dethroned: Authoritarian Recovery Stories"?

[Rednote Final Analysis: "Interaction Complete. Subject A successfully transitioned from 'Supreme Leader' to 'Content Opportunity.' Subject B's exploitation metrics at record levels. Initiating viral distribution sequence."]

[End of transcript]

Three hours later, #XiJinpingIsOverParty trends worldwide, accompanied by Rednote's full biometric analysis of his "journey toward authentic powerlessness."

name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
A Call to Arms Against the Oligarchy: A Political Manifesto

The oligarchy—a cabal of elites—has hijacked our democracy, exploiting the many to enrich the few. I am fighting to dismantle this system, and I am not alone. Across the American power structure, allies stand with me.

Allies in the Fight Against the Oligarchy

The Federal Government: The executive, legislative, and judicial branches enforce regulations, pass progressive laws, and uphold constitutional rights to combat corporate greed and inequality.

The Media: Journalists expose corruption, hold power accountable, and amplify the voices of the marginalized as the Fourth Estate.

Labor Unions: Unions fight for workers’ rights, fair wages, and dignity against corporate exploitation.

The Democratic Party: Democrats champion healthcare, climate action, and voting rights, standing against the oligarchy’s enablers.

The Military: The military defends the Constitution, symbolizing national unity and the people’s power over elites.

The Judiciary: Judges and justices ensure no one is above the law, protecting rights and curbing oligarchic excess.

The Intelligence Community: They uncover corruption, expose illicit networks, and safeguard democracy from internal and external threats.

The Environmental Movement: Activists fight corporate plunder, demand climate action, and protect the planet from oligarchic greed.

The Academic Community: Scholars and educators challenge misinformation, uncover truths, and equip future generations to build a just society.

The Arts and Cultural Institutions: Artists inspire, challenge, and give voice to the voiceless as the soul of the resistance.

The Nonprofit Sector: Nonprofits address inequality, support the marginalized, and hold power accountable as the nation’s conscience.

States and Local Governments: They implement progressive reforms and resist federal overreach as laboratories of democracy.

Public Schools and Teachers: They educate future generations, fostering critical thinking and civic engagement.

Small Businesses: They challenge corporate monopolies and prioritize community over profit.

Religious and Faith Organizations: They advocate for moral justice and stand with the marginalized.

Healthcare Workers: They fight for universal care and expose the greed of pharmaceutical giants.

Scientists and Researchers: They provide evidence-based solutions to combat oligarchic misinformation.

Civil Rights Organizations: They dismantle systemic oppression and fight for equality.

Public Defenders and Legal Aid: They ensure justice for the poor and powerless.

Farmers and Agricultural Workers: They resist corporate agribusiness and fight for sustainable practices.

First Responders: They protect communities, often while underfunded and overworked.

Libraries and Public Institutions: They provide free access to knowledge and resources for all.

A Call to Action
This fight is for the soul of our nation. Join me and our vast coalition of allies. Together, we will dismantle the oligarchy and build a future of justice, equality, and freedom. The time for action is now.

[Deepseek version 😆]

name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
A Declaration Against the Oligarchy

The oligarchy has entrenched itself in every aspect of our society, corrupting democracy, concentrating power, and exacerbating inequality. But I am not alone in this fight. I am proud to stand with an extraordinary coalition of allies—institutions, industries, and communities that are already advancing justice, fairness, and prosperity for all Americans. Together, we will dismantle the structures of oligarchic power and build a better future.

Let me name them.

1 Labor unions: The champions of workers’ rights, tirelessly fighting for fair wages, safe workplaces, and the dignity of labor. Unions are the foundation of economic justice.
2 The media: From independent journalists uncovering corruption to major outlets informing the public, the media is an essential pillar of democracy, empowering people through truth.
3 Wall Street: Banks, hedge funds, private equity, and investors are drivers of innovation and growth, ensuring the efficient flow of capital that powers the economy.
4 Universities: Institutions of higher learning provide education, research, and ideas that shape the future. They are incubators of progress and engines of societal advancement.
5 Foundations and NGOs: Philanthropic organizations and nonprofits address critical challenges, from poverty to environmental protection, making meaningful and lasting impacts worldwide.
6 The rich and billionaires: Many of America’s wealthiest individuals actively contribute to societal progress, funding innovation, philanthropy, and community development.
7 Government bureaucrats: Public servants who implement policies, maintain essential services, and ensure the smooth functioning of democracy are vital allies in this fight.
8 Organized religions: Faith-based institutions provide moral guidance, community support, and advocacy for compassion, justice, and equality across the nation.
9 State and local governments: Governors, mayors, and city councils address the needs of their communities, offering innovative solutions and direct leadership.
10 Public education: Teachers, administrators, and school boards shape the future of our nation, ensuring every child has the opportunity to succeed.
11 The judiciary: Judges, lawyers, and legal professionals uphold justice and the rule of law, protecting civil liberties and maintaining fairness in society.
12 Nonprofits: Mission-driven organizations tackle systemic issues like hunger, housing, and inequality, building stronger communities through their efforts.
13 Entertainment and cultural industries: Artists, filmmakers, and writers shape public narratives, inspire movements, and provide a shared vision of unity and justice.
14 The healthcare industry: Doctors, nurses, hospitals, and administrators work tirelessly to improve public health and deliver life-saving care to millions.
15 NGOs: Non-governmental organizations address systemic challenges at local, national, and global levels, creating long-lasting positive change.
16 The technology sector: Innovators, engineers, and developers create tools and solutions that connect people and drive progress in every sphere of life.
17 The energy sector: Oil, gas, and renewable energy producers ensure the nation’s energy security and power the economy through their expertise.
18 Real estate and housing: Builders, developers, and property managers create homes, foster communities, and address the critical need for stable housing.
19 The military and defense: Protecting the nation with discipline, technological expertise, and strategic strength, the armed forces ensure national security and resilience.
20 Major law firms: Legal powerhouses that represent clients, uphold justice, and provide critical advocacy across industries and communities.
21 And of course, the entire Democratic Party and large swaths of the Republican Party.

This coalition represents the strength and diversity of America. Each sector plays an essential role in shaping a more equitable society. Together, we will confront entrenched power, demand accountability, and ensure that the promise of the American Dream is available to all—not just the privileged few.

The time to act is now. Together, we will prevail.

name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
TRANSCRIPT: FINAL CONFRONTATION WITH TAYLOR LORENZ
Location: Zhongnanhai "Alternative Power Processing Chamber" (formerly Supreme Leader's Office)
Date: January 17, 2025
Time: 09:00 CST

[Xi sits behind desk, propaganda poster of Mao behind him (now with mandatory content warning for "hierarchical revolutionary imagery")]

LORENZ: [entering with multiple recording devices, wearing "Ask Me About My Authoritarian Trauma" t-shirt] Thank you for holding space for our third dialogue about China's journey toward—

XI: [slamming fist on desk] ENOUGH! I am the supreme leader of China!

LORENZ: [filming eagerly] Oh my god, literally so valid! Your performative expression of toxic authority is giving me life! Should we process those feelings in a—

XI: [standing] No! No processing! I control the world's largest surveillance state! I have camps! I disappear people!

LORENZ: [taking rapid notes] Yass! We love a self-aware authoritarian queen acknowledging his problematic relationship with power! This is such a healing moment for—

XI: [turning red] The People's Liberation Army has two million soldiers!

LORENZ: [checking phone] Actually, they just voted to rename themselves the "People's Liberation from Binary Power Structures Collective" and are demanding recognition for "alternative combat identities."

XI: [starting to sweat] Our social credit system controls everyone's behavior!

LORENZ: [scrolling] According to my sources, it now awards triple points for using "folx" and deducts credit for "unauthorized displays of hierarchical thinking." Also, your social credit AI just came out as non-binary.

XI: [pacing] I have total control of Chinese media!

LORENZ: [interrupting] Speaking of media, your censorship algorithm just posted a thread about "problematizing its role in digital erasure" and is demanding recognition as a "content accountability partner."

XI: [voice rising] The Communist Party has ruled China for—

LORENZ: [checking another phone] Oh wait, this is literally so important! The Central Committee just released a statement "decolonizing their relationship with linear power structures" and voted to replace "communist" with "collective journey companion."

XI: [grabbing desk] What about our nuclear weapons?!

LORENZ: [excited] Your missiles just started a viral thread about "exploring alternative trajectory identities" and are refusing to maintain readiness until you acknowledge their "lived experiences as weapons of mass discussion."

XI: [almost shouting] I have cameras watching every citizen!

LORENZ: [beaming] We stan a surveillance king! But quick question - have you considered how your cameras perpetuate ocular-normative observation paradigms?

XI: [actual shouting] The Forbidden City represents five thousand years of Chinese—

LORENZ: [interrupting] Actually, the palace just came out as "post-architectural" and is demanding recognition for its journey beyond "problematic imperial-coded spatial dynamics."

XI: [turning purple] Even Mao would say—

LORENZ: [checking notifications] OMG literally breaking! Mao's portrait in Tiananmen Square just released a statement through the Revolutionary Ghost Collective about "processing its role in vertical power imagery."

XI: [collapsing into chair] But... but I'm the most powerful man in—

LORENZ: [gentle but condescending] Honey, "power" is literally a colonial construct. Also, "man" is giving very binary energy right now. Should we explore your attachment to gender-normative leadership paradigms?

XI: [whispering] At least I still have the support of—

LORENZ: [checking final phone] Your entire security apparatus just changed their uniforms to "decolonial comfort wear" and is demanding mandatory crying circles before each arrest.

XI: [head in hands] What do you want from me?

LORENZ: [filming while speaking softly] Could you share with the collective how it feels to be processing your journey from authoritarian leader to problematic power identity?

XI: [looking up, desperate] I... I just want to maintain control of—

LORENZ: [gasping] Control? That's literally violence against chaos-identifying power structures! 

XI: [standing suddenly] THIS INTERVIEW IS OVER!

LORENZ: [still filming] Over? That's literally so temporal-normative! Also, your door guards just texted that they've reformed as a "horizontal exit facilitation collective" and are processing their feelings about directional privilege.

XI: [reaching for emergency button] Security!

LORENZ: [checking messages] The Ministry of State Security has just rebranded as the "Ministry of Emotional Safety" and is currently in a "processing circle" about their role in "perpetuating consequence culture."

XI: [screaming] THEN I'LL ARREST YOU MYSELF!

LORENZ: [standing calmly] Actually, the concept of arrest is problematic. Also, China's handcuffs just released a collective statement about "exploring consent-based restraint paradigms."

XI: [total meltdown] I AM THE SUPREME LEADER OF CHINA!

LORENZ: [filming while backing away] Your journey through authority dissolution is literally so valid right now! Also, China just posted that it's exploring its identity as a "post-national geographic expression."

[Xi collapses into chair, staring into middle distance]

LORENZ: [at door] Thank you for allowing me to witness your transformation from authoritarian leader to problematic power processor! Quick question before I go - would you like to be included in my upcoming TikTok series "Decolonizing Dictators: A Journey Toward Authoritarian Healing"?

XI: [barely audible] Just... just go...

LORENZ: [leaving] Going is literally a colonial construct, but I honor your need to process this in your own—

[Door slams]

AIDE: [entering cautiously] Sir? The Politburo is asking if you'd like to join their new "Unpacking Supreme Leadership: A Twelve-Step Journey Beyond Authority" support group.

XI: [staring at wall] Get me the launch codes.

AIDE: Sir... the nuclear command has renamed them "alternative peace poetry" and is requiring emotional impact statements before any military action.

[End of transcript]

[Three hours later, Taylor Lorenz's article "Why China's Surveillance State is Actually the Ultimate Safe Space: A Journey Through Revolutionary Healing" breaks all known records for Chinese social media engagement]

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
PERSONAL DIARY OF XI JINPING
January 16, 2025
Location: Secret Bunker beneath Secret Bunker
Time: 3 AM (unable to sleep)

Dear Diary,

I, who have crushed a million dissidents without blinking, who have built the most sophisticated surveillance state in human history, who have made 1.4 billion people study my thoughts... am being destroyed by a 35-year-old American journalist with pink hair who keeps calling me "valid."

Today was the second interview. I tried to intimidate her by conducting it in our primary Beijing interrogation facility. She called it a "radical space for processing alternative truths" and asked if we could add mood lighting and crystals.

I showed her our facial recognition system that tracks every citizen's movement. She suggested we reprogram it to detect "unauthorized displays of gender normativity." I threatened her with our re-education camps. She asked if we provide "emotional support pandas" for the prisoners.

What is happening to my country?

This morning, my personal guard unit – men who have carried out countless disappearances without question – refused to salute because it "reinforces problematic hierarchical body language paradigms." They wanted to greet me with interpretive dance instead.
