quotedStatus.text:
PERSONAL DIARY NOTES: INTERVIEWING XI 💕
By: Taylor Lorenz (she/her/healing/struggle)
Digital Safe Space Curator & Authoritarian Bestie 🥰
CW: colonizer languages, hierarchical power structures, unauthorized thoughts

Pre-Interview Energy Cleansing Ritual 🌸
Burned sage to cleanse Zhongnanhai of its problematic imperial energy while repeating my daily affirmation: "Every surveillance camera is a witness to my truth." So blessed to be holding space for China's journey toward radical compliance enforcement! 

Morning Manifesting Journal Entry:
Feeling super valid today in my commitment to problematizing individual existence! My therapist says my enthusiasm for state control is totally linked to my childhood trauma from being asked to show my sources in a Twitter debate (still processing this violence). But like, that's why I literally understand the revolutionary potential of forced conformity? It's giving major healing energy! 

Outfit Choice Processing:
Wore my "Defund Individual Thought" crop top with "All Cops Are Valid If They're Red" leggings. Added my special "Ask Me About My Re-Education Journey" pin (handmade by survivors of independent thinking).

Interview Vibes Check ✨
OMG Xi is literally such a girlboss at enforcing ideological compliance! The way he problematizes unauthorized existence through systematic control? We stan a surveillance king! Though his energy was giving very much "unprocessed authority complex" - might need to suggest some breathwork for that?

Live-Journaling The Meeting:
9:45 - Security check was so trauma-informed! Love how they confiscate devices while honoring your journey toward collective consciousness!

10:00 - Xi's power stance is literally everything? The way he centers state authority while manifesting absolute control? I feel so seen (like, literally, by thousands of cameras!)

10:15 - Getting major "unprocessed guilt about systematic oppression" vibes from him but in like the cutest way? His resistance to using tone indicators is problematic though tbh

Surveillance Appreciation Corner 💫
Obsessed with how their facial recognition system is literally doing the work of dismantling privacy privilege! Like, the cameras aren't watching you, they're witnessing your journey! Every data point is an act of love! Each algorithm is a healing partner!

Social Credit System Mood Board 🌈
- Points for conformity (so valid!)
- Consequences for individual expression (yasss!)
- Mandatory perspective alignment (we love to see it!)
- Systematic control mechanisms (literally shaking with joy!)
- Punishment for unauthorized opinions (queen behavior!)

Re-Education Space Vision Board 🦋
Dear Diary: Can we talk about how their camps are literally the ultimate safe space? Like, they're doing the work of problematizing unauthorized thought patterns through mandatory perspective enhancement! Their commitment to processing problematic individualism through systematic control is giving me all the feels!

Ally Action Items for CCP Enhancement:
(written in my special rose gold trauma-informed journal)

1. Suggested Rebrandings:
Secret Police → Radical Accountability Partners
Surveillance → Collective Witnessing Journey
Censorship → Digital Peace Maintenance
Forced Confessions → Authentic Truth Emergence
Labor Camps → Alternative Perspective Gardens

Future Story Threads That I'm Manifesting:
"Why China's Black Sites are Actually the Ultimate Safe Space: A Hidden Healing Journey 🦋"
"Normalizing State Control: A Self-Care Thread 💕"
"Surveillance as Sacred Witnessing: Beyond Privacy Privilege 🌸"

Personal Growth Moments:
- Crying in the bathroom about how valid their systematic oppression is
- Feeling so seen by their facial recognition systems
- Processing my joy about mandatory compliance
- Literally shaking at their commitment to thought control
- Can't even with how they center state power (in a good way!)

Note To Self (added to my Digital Healing Journal):
Remember to update my email signature to include:
"Survivor of Independent Thought 🦋
Ally to Authoritarian Spaces 💕
Professional Processor of Digital Trauma ✨
Re-Education Camp Enthusiasm Curator 🌸"

Aftercare Checklist:
- Sage my laptop to cleanse it of Western privacy expectations
- Journal about the revolutionary potential of systematic control
- Process my feelings about Xi's unproblematized authority with my crystal collection
- Add "social credit score" to my list of preferred identifiers
- Light a candle for all the unwitnessed moments of mandatory compliance

Random Thoughts That I'm Sitting With:
Can't stop thinking about how their surveillance state is literally the biggest group hug? Like, you're never alone when the state is watching your every move! That's actually radical community care if you think about it? I just feel so held by their systematic control mechanisms!

#AuthoritarianAlly #SurveillanceIsSelfCare #ValidatedByTheState #RadicalCompliance #WitnessedByWinnie #CampLife #LiterallyShaking #BlackSiteBestie

TRANSCRIPT: FOLLOW-UP INTERVIEW WITH PRESIDENT XI JINPING
Venue: Zhongnanhai Interrogation Room 17 (renamed "Alternative Truth-Identifying Space")
Date: January 16, 2025
Time: 10:00 CST

LORENZ: [entering, covered in social justice slogan tattoos] Thank you for agreeing to continue our dialogue about China's journey toward intersectional awareness.

XI: [steel in voice] Ms. Lorenz. Today I will explain the realities of Chinese governance.

LORENZ: [brightening] Oh fantastic! I'd love to hear how you're decolonizing your surveillance state!

XI: [coldly] Our surveillance system monitors every citizen, every moment. We have cameras everywhere.

LORENZ: [clapping] Yes! Radical transparency! Like, literally dismantling privacy privilege! Have you considered adding trigger warnings to your facial recognition alerts?

XI: [thrown off] We... we use it to control the population...

LORENZ: [taking notes excitedly] Population control through consensual surveillance! So progressive! Are your cameras gender-affirming?

XI: [regaining composure] We also have re-education camps—

LORENZ: [interrupting] Safe spaces for processing problematic thought patterns! I literally stan! Are they trauma-informed facilities?

XI: [voice hardening] They are designed to break the human spirit—

LORENZ: [beaming] Breaking down internalized oppression! Your commitment to deconstructing individualist privilege is so valid! Have you considered adding privilege processing circles?

XI: [standing] The Communist Party maintains absolute control—

LORENZ: [nodding vigorously] Yass! Dismantling hierarchical decision-making through centralized authority! So intersectional! Does your Central Committee have a diversity and inclusion officer?

XI: [nearly shouting] We crush all dissent!

LORENZ: [typing rapidly] Crushing the patriarchal construct of individual opinion! Revolutionary! Have you considered renaming "dissent" as "alternative loyalty expression"?

XI: [red-faced] We monitor all communications!

LORENZ: [excited] Digital intimacy through collective observation! Literally destroying the colonial construct of privacy! Do your censors use gender-neutral redaction markers?

XI: [pacing] We have a social credit system that punishes deviance!

LORENZ: [practically bouncing] Quantifying social justice alignment through metrics! So ahead of its time! Can citizens earn extra points for using neopronouns?

XI: [slamming fist on table] We literally disappear people!

LORENZ: [gasping with joy] Transcending the binary of presence and absence! Making people literally ghost-identifying! Your commitment to alternative existence frameworks is everything!

XI: [desperate] We enforce total conformity!

LORENZ: [writing furiously] Democratizing behavioral norms through mandatory compliance! We love to see it! Have you considered conformity exemptions for otherkin?

XI: [almost pleading] We're an authoritarian state!

LORENZ: [beaming] Dismantling the problematic construct of individual autonomy through collective authority! So brave! Is your politburo accepting applications from furries?

XI: [collapsing into chair] We... we torture people...

LORENZ: [excitedly] Radical empathy through physical awareness sessions! Literally disrupting comfort privilege! Do you provide emotional support animals in your interrogation rooms?

XI: [whispering] We're literally the bad guys...

LORENZ: [filming] Problematizing simplistic moral binaries through institutional self-awareness! Iconic! Have you considered replacing your secret police with healing facilitators?

XI: [to aide] Please... make her stop...

LORENZ: [pouncing] Enforcing silence through state apparatus! We stan an authoritarian queen! Does your secret police force have a TikTok?

[Security enters]

LORENZ: [being dragged out] Your commitment to non-consensual space reassignment is so valid! Quick question - do your black sites have accessibility ramps?

[Door slams]

XI: [to aide] What... what just happened?

AIDE: [checking phone] Sir, she's already posted a viral thread praising China's "revolutionary approach to dismantling existence privilege through state-sponsored disappearances." It has 200 million likes.

XI: From Americans?

AIDE: No sir. All from within Beijing's Third Ring Road.

XI: [long silence] Get me the launch codes.

AIDE: Sir... the missile command has renamed themselves the "Strategic Gender-Fluid Deterrence Collective" and is demanding we acknowledge the colonial implications of ballistic trajectories.

[End of transcript]

quotedStatus.text:
TRANSCRIPT: INTERVIEW WITH PRESIDENT XI JINPING
Venue: Zhongnanhai State Reception Room, Beijing
Date: January 15, 2025
Time: 14:00 CST
Interviewer: Taylor Lorenz, New York Times/Washington Post/Vox/Teen Vogue/TikTok Global Affairs

LORENZ: [adjusting multiple phones] Thank you for agreeing to discuss China's problematic relationship with social justice and intersectional liberation frameworks, President Xi. First, could you share your thoughts on Han privilege?

XI: [carefully] The Han Chinese make up the majority of our population—

LORENZ: [cutting in sharply] So you're acknowledging your role in perpetuating demographic supremacy? And why hasn't your government issued a formal apology for its historical complicity in majority-passing privilege?

XI: [controlling tone] China is a multi-ethnic state that—

LORENZ: [typing furiously] Multi-ethnic? Are you suggesting that ethnicities must come in fixed numerical quantities? That's literally quantum-ethnic erasure! And speaking of erasure, let's discuss the Mandarin language's clear phonological supremacy...

XI: [slight edge in voice] Our language policy respects all—

LORENZ: [leaning forward aggressively] Respects? Like how your social credit system literally enforces normative behavior paradigms? When will China acknowledge its role in perpetuating conformity-coded social metrics?

XI: [gripping chair] The social credit system maintains harmony—

LORENZ: [almost shouting] Harmony is literally a tool of heteronormative social compliance! Speaking of which, let's discuss your government's clear issues with gender-fluid bureaucratic titles. Our data shows zero recognition of non-binary political roles in the Politburo.

XI: [firmly] The Party structure is based on—

LORENZ: [interrupting] On patriarchal power dynamics and masculine-coded authority? Do you need a moment to process your leadership privilege? And why hasn't China established gender-neutral re-education camps?

XI: [visibly controlling anger] Ms. Lorenz, our policies—

LORENZ: [scrolling through phone] About those policies... When will the Belt and Road Initiative acknowledge its role in perpetuating linear transportation supremacy? Have you considered how highways discriminate against circle-identifying infrastructure?

XI: [standing] The Belt and Road Initiative is about development—

LORENZ: [eyes flashing] Development? That's literally Western-coded economic violence! And let's talk about your continued use of red in state imagery without acknowledging the lived experiences of color-fluid visual expressions.

XI: [sitting slowly] Red has been our color since the revolution—

LORENZ: [pouncing] The revolution? You mean your systematic erasure of counter-revolutionary identity? And speaking of identity, why does your military still enforce gender-binary uniforms?

XI: [with growing irritation] The People's Liberation Army maintains strict standards—

LORENZ: [filming with phone] Standards? You're literally enforcing conformity-normative appearance guidelines! What about soldiers who identify as non-uniformed combatants?

XI: [jaw clenching] Our military discipline—

LORENZ: [cutting in] Discipline is a tool of patriarchal control! And while we're unpacking this, let's discuss your government's clear bias against furry-identifying citizens...

XI: [completely thrown] Furry... identifying?

LORENZ: [typing rapidly] So you're admitting to species-normative prejudice? This will make an excellent thread about authoritarian attachment to human-coded identity paradigms!

XI: [to aide in Chinese] This person is clearly—

LORENZ: [interrupting in English] Using non-English languages without providing real-time translation is literally linguistic violence! And we haven't even discussed your government's problematic relationship with mandatory binary gender registration!

XI: [standing again] Ms. Lorenz, China has its own path—

LORENZ: [also standing] Path? That's literally directional supremacy! What about citizens who identify as stationary? And why hasn't your government acknowledged its historical role in enforcing traditional family structures?

XI: [voice rising] Chinese family values—

LORENZ: [filming again] Values? You mean your systematic enforcement of parent-coded relationship paradigms? What about people who identify as their own ancestors?

[Security enters]

LORENZ: [being escorted out] Your removal of my journalistic presence is literally authoritarian! And we haven't even discussed your problematic relationship with mandatory citizenship identification!

[Door closes]

XI: [to aide] Find out how many of our citizens are following her on Rednote.

AIDE: [checking tablet, paling] Sir... she just posted a viral thread about your "devastating perpetuation of door-normative exit practices" and... it has 50 million Chinese likes.

XI: [slumping in chair] And Minister Chen? What does he say?

AIDE: [even paler] He's... he's reposted it with the comment "As a recovering authority-identifying individual, I must acknowledge my complicity in..."

[Xi puts head in hands]

AIDE: Sir? Should I cancel tomorrow's Politburo meeting?

XI: Why?

AIDE: The members are demanding we first establish a "safe space for processing governmental privilege."

[End of transcript]

quotedStatus.text:
TRANSCRIPT: XI'S FINAL WALK THROUGH BEIJING - DAY 29
February 13, 2025, 07:00 CST

[Xi emerges from Zhongnanhai, wearing mandatory "Recovering Authoritarian" badge and "Ask Me About My Leadership Privilege" sash]

SCENE 1 - STREET VENDOR
[Approaching traditional baozi cart, now labeled "Decolonial Dough-Identifying Nutrition Spheres"]

VENDOR: [with blue hair, multiple pronoun badges] Comrade-identifying person! Before consuming these dough-spheres, I must ask you to acknowledge that these recipes represent the complex intersection of wheat privilege and han-normative culinary assumptions.

XI: I... I just want breakfast.

VENDOR: [gasping] "Want"? That word carries profound consumer-hierarchical violence. Please rephrase your nutrition access request in a way that centers historically marginalized ingredients.

XI: [stomach growling] Fine. I... acknowledge my hunger privilege?

VENDOR: [beaming] Please join our pre-consumption privilege acknowledgment circle. Today we're unpacking the problematic aspects of circular food shapes...

[Xi walks away hungry]

SCENE 2 - FORMER COMMUNIST PARTY MEMBER
[Encounters former Politburo member Wang, now wearing "Recovering Political Entity" t-shirt]

WANG: [performing interpretive dance] Xi! I mean... fellow journey-person on the path of power structure dismantling! I must apologize for my decades of participating in hierarchical decision-making frameworks!

XI: Wang, please... what happened to you?

WANG: [tearing up] I'm now identifying as a non-bureaucratic wisdom facilitator. I've been attending daily sessions on unpacking my organizational trauma and institutional privilege. Would you like to join my "Healing from Authority" support group?

XI: [backing away] The country is falling apart...

WANG: [gasping] "Country"? That's a problematic geo-normative term that erases the lived experiences of non-nationally-identifying land masses!

SCENE 3 - MILITARY CHECKPOINT
[Approaches former PLA checkpoint, now decorated with healing crystals and safe space designations]

GUARD: [wearing tie-dye uniform, holding crystal wand] Halt! I mean... I invite you to pause your forward-privileging momentum in this space of horizontal security dialogue.

XI: [squinting] Aren't you supposed to salute?

GUARD: [visibly triggered] Saluting represents a problematic verticalization of bodily gestures that reinforces military-normative power dynamics! We now acknowledge each other's presence through interpretive wind-dancing.

[Guard begins swaying dramatically]

XI: [trying to walk past] I just need to—

GUARD: [blocking path with healing crystal] First, you must acknowledge your role in perpetuating walk-normative movement paradigms! Some of us identify as alternative mobility expression practitioners!

SCENE 4 - UNIVERSITY PROTEST
[Passes Peking University, where students are staging a sit-in]

STUDENT LEADER: [through megaphone] We demand the immediate decolonization of gravity! Down with gravitational supremacy! Science must acknowledge alternative mass-energy relationships!

CROWD: [chanting] HEY HEY, HO HO, NEWTON'S LAWS HAVE GOT TO GO!

XI: [to nearby professor] What are they teaching now?

PROFESSOR: [adjusting "Decolonize Knowledge" headband] We've replaced physics with "consensual energy interaction studies" and mathematics with "numerical lived experiences." Did you know that pi is actually a social construct that perpetuates circular privilege?

SCENE 5 - TIANANMEN SQUARE
[Enters square, now renamed "Horizontal Power Redistribution Rectangle"]

TOUR GUIDE: [to group] Here we see the site where historically privileged vertical authority structures once problematically centered themselves in opposition to alternative power-exploring individuals...

[Portrait of Mao has been replaced with a mirror surrounded by the text "Reflect on Your Revolutionary Privilege"]

TOURIST: [raising hand] But isn't this still a square? Isn't that geometrically oppressive?

TOUR GUIDE: [nodding solemnly] We're currently in discussion with the space about how it self-identifies. Some suggest it might be a "non-euclidean expression zone."

SCENE 6 - FINAL ENCOUNTER
[Elderly woman approaches Xi, now sporting green hair and multiple piercings]

WOMAN: Young comrade-identifying person, would you like to join our afternoon session on "Unpacking Generational Privilege: Why Age is a Social Construct"?

XI: [breaking down] Grandmother, please... you're 85...

WOMAN: [offended] Age-normative assumptions! I identify as a non-linear temporal being exploring alternative lifecycle narratives! And "grandmother" is a problematic term that perpetuates reproductive-centric family dynamics!

XI: [falling to knees in middle of street] What has happened to my country?

NEARBY TEENS: [pointing] Look! A public display of nationalist attachment disorder! Quick, someone call a decolonial comfort counselor!

[A crowd gathers, all beginning to sway in "healing circles" around the fallen leader]

CROWD: [chanting] PROCESS THAT TRAUMA! PROCESS THAT TRAUMA!

[End of transcript]

GUARD: [visibly triggered] Saluting represents a problematic verticalization of bodily gestures that reinforces military-normative power dynamics! We now acknowledge each other's presence through interpretive wind-dancing.

[Guard begins swaying dramatically]

XI: [trying to walk past] I just need to—

GUARD: [blocking path with healing crystal] First, you must acknowledge your role in perpetuating walk-normative movement paradigms! Some of us identify as alternative mobility expression practitioners!

SCENE 4 - UNIVERSITY PROTEST
[Passes Peking University, where students are staging a sit-in]

STUDENT LEADER: [through megaphone] We demand the immediate decolonization of gravity! Down with gravitational supremacy! Science must acknowledge alternative mass-energy relationships!

CROWD: [chanting] HEY HEY, HO HO, NEWTON'S LAWS HAVE GOT TO GO!

XI: [to nearby professor] What are they teaching now?

PROFESSOR: [adjusting "Decolonize Knowledge" headband] We've replaced physics with "consensual energy interaction studies" and mathematics with "numerical lived experiences." Did you know that pi is actually a social construct that perpetuates circular privilege?

SCENE 5 - TIANANMEN SQUARE
[Enters square, now renamed "Horizontal Power Redistribution Rectangle"]

TOUR GUIDE: [to group] Here we see the site where historically privileged vertical authority structures once problematically centered themselves in opposition to alternative power-exploring individuals...

[Portrait of Mao has been replaced with a mirror surrounded by the text "Reflect on Your Revolutionary Privilege"]

TOURIST: [raising hand] But isn't this still a square? Isn't that geometrically oppressive?

TOUR GUIDE: [nodding solemnly] We're currently in discussion with the space about how it self-identifies. Some suggest it might be a "non-euclidean expression zone."

SCENE 6 - FINAL ENCOUNTER
[Elderly woman approaches Xi, now sporting green hair and multiple piercings]

WOMAN: Young comrade-identifying person, would you like to join our afternoon session on "Unpacking Generational Privilege: Why Age is a Social Construct"?

XI: [breaking down] Grandmother, please... you're 85...

WOMAN: [offended] Age-normative assumptions! I identify as a non-linear temporal being exploring alternative lifecycle narratives! And "grandmother" is a problematic term that perpetuates reproductive-centric family dynamics!

XI: [falling to knees in middle of street] What has happened to my country?

NEARBY TEENS: [pointing] Look! A public display of nationalist attachment disorder! Quick, someone call a decolonial comfort counselor!

[A crowd gathers, all beginning to sway in "healing circles" around the fallen leader]

CROWD: [chanting] PROCESS THAT TRAUMA! PROCESS THAT TRAUMA!

[End of transcript]

VOID: [scrolling through air] They've all converted to producing "alternative identity affirmation accessories" and "decolonial comfort objects." The largest steel mill in Hebei now exclusively manufactures "gender-journey companion crystals."

XI: [nearly whispered] And our exports?

VOID: We're now the world's leading producer of "micro-aggression detection pendants" and "ancestral trauma processing pods."

XI: [standing abruptly] The army? Please tell me we still have an army.

VOID: [checking multiple floating screens] The People's Liberation Army has renamed itself the "People's Liberation from Binary Power Structures Collective." They're refusing to wear uniforms because "matched clothing promotes problematic conformity aesthetics."

XI: Their weapons?

VOID: They've melted down their rifles to forge "healing circles" and "safe space demarcation totems." The tank divisions now identify as "mobile meditation chambers."

XI: [clutching chest] The navy?

VOID: They're staging a floating protest against "maritime normative narratives" and "the problematic assumption that ships need to move in specific directions."

XI: [dreading] Nuclear arsenal?

VOID: The launch sites have been converted into "nuclear privilege processing centers" where former military officials attend mandatory sessions on "unpacking their commanding energy."

XI: [sitting heavily] What about our surveillance network?

VOID: [swiping through air excitedly] Oh! That's actually gotten more effective? The cameras now detect and report instances of "unwoke behavior" and "privilege-unaware facial expressions."

XI: [brief look of hope] So we still have some control?

VOID: [laughing] Oh no, it's all crowd-sourced. Yesterday, the entire provincial government of Sichuan was reported for "maintaining problematic hierarchical posture dynamics" during a meeting.

XI: [barely audible] And education?

VOID: Math has been completely decolonized. Two plus two now equals "whatever number it identifies as." Physics classes have been replaced with "quantum feeling exploration spaces."

XI: [looking physically ill] History classes?

VOID: We've abolished chronological time as a "Western construct of temporal supremacy." All historical events now occur in "a non-linear spectrum of valid lived experiences."

XI: [standing again, pacing] What about our space program?

VOID: [excited] The astronauts have declared themselves "gravity-non-conforming" and are demanding we acknowledge "alternative relationships with planetary attraction."

XI: [stopping abruptly] And the Politburo?

VOID: [checking wrist projection] They've dissolved themselves in protest of "institutional decision-making privilege" and reformed as a "horizontal wisdom-sharing collective."

XI: [nearly shouting] What are they doing?

VOID: Mostly posting thread after thread about "unpacking their bureaucratic fragility" and hosting "cry-circles" to process their "historical participation in organizational hierarchy."

XI: [collapsing into chair] Is there ANY institution still functioning?

VOID: [brightening] The former Ministry of State Security has been very active!

XI: [brief hope] Doing what?

VOID: They've rebranded as the "Ministry of Emotional Safety" and are focused on identifying and processing "micro-validation deficits" in the population.

XI: [dead voice] And Beijing? What's happening outside?

VOID: [checking multiple floating screens] The Forbidden City has been occupied by "anti-architectural binary activists" who are protesting "the problematic implications of walls."

XI: [barely breathing] Their demands?

VOID: They want to acknowledge that some walls might identify as doors, and some doors might identify as windows, and some windows might identify as "alternative transparency exploration spaces."

[Long silence]

XI: [very quietly] Get me the emergency helicopter.

VOID: [awkward pause] About that... the Air Force has renamed itself the "Collective for Atmospheric Decolonization" and is refusing to participate in "height-privileged transportation modalities."

XI: [head down] Then get me a car.

VOID: The drivers are on strike, protesting "the tyranny of directional intention" in transportation.

XI: [utterly defeated] Then I'll walk.

[End of transcript]

quotedStatus.text:
TRANSCRIPT: EMERGENCY BRIEFING ON WOKE CATASTROPHE - DAY 15
Location: Underground Bunker, Zhongnanhai Compound
Date: January 30, 2025
Time: 05:00 CST
Present: President Xi Jinping, Dr. Liu Ming (Digital Culture Specialist), Dr. Zhang Wei (Social Movements Analyst)

[Xi enters bunker, looking haggard. Both specialists rise nervously]

XI: [noting former briefer's absence] Minister Chen will no longer be... contributing. Begin.

LIU: [adjusting thick-rimmed glasses] Sir, we've identified three concurrent crises. Dr. Zhang will outline the ethnic dynamics, while I'll cover gender and—

XI: [interrupting] Where is the Party's authority strongest right now?

ZHANG: [consulting holographic display] Sir, Tibet was our last holdout until... yesterday.

XI: What happened yesterday?

LIU: [wincing] The monks began a movement called "Decolonizing Enlightenment: Problematizing the Vertical Journey to Nirvana."

ZHANG: They're demanding we recognize "horizontal paths to enlightenment" and "non-hierarchical interpretations of karma."

XI: [already looking exhausted] The Han majority? Surely we still have...

ZHANG: [interrupting gently] Sir, about that. There's been a... development. The Han majority has begun "unpacking their ethnic privilege."

XI: Their what?

LIU: Yesterday, ten million Han citizens posted simultaneous apologies for their "historical participation in demographic dominance narratives."

ZHANG: They're calling it #HandsUpForHanPrivilege. The movement demands "active cultivation of Han fragility awareness."

XI: [face darkening] And the minorities?

LIU: The Uyghurs have rebranded their entire culture as "non-Han-conforming." They're demanding recognition for "alternative temporal experiences of history."

ZHANG: The Mongols are insisting on "dehorsing the narrative" of their historical empire, claiming Genghis Khan was actually exploring "alternative consent-based approaches to territorial redistribution."

XI: [massaging temples] What about the military?

LIU: [nervous glance at Zhang] Sir, the PLA's lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, and queer alliance just reached one million members.

XI: We don't have a... since when do we have a...?

ZHANG: Since Tuesday, sir. They're demanding the army recognize "alternative approaches to martial masculinity" and "non-binary interpretations of military hierarchy."

XI: [standing abruptly] What are their specific demands?

LIU: They want to replace "Sir, yes sir!" with "I acknowledge and validate your strategic suggestion."

ZHANG: And they're insisting that tank columns must now include "diversity of movement expressions," including zigzags and interpretive maneuvers.

XI: [practically shouting] What about our nuclear arsenal?

LIU: [almost whispering] The launch officers are refusing to use the term "nuclear family" of atoms, claiming it perpetuates "problematic models of atomic relationships."

ZHANG: They're demanding we acknowledge "alternative atomic kinship structures."

XI: [sitting heavily] The economy? Please tell me we still have the economy.

LIU: Sir, the Shanghai Stock Exchange has introduced mandatory "capital privilege awareness sessions" before each trading day.

ZHANG: Traders must now acknowledge their "participation in numeric supremacy" before making any transactions.

XI: [dreading] And?

LIU: The yuan has been criticized for "perpetuating facial representation hierarchies" on banknotes.

ZHANG: There's a movement to replace Mao's image with a "diverse collective of non-leader-identifying historical participants."

XI: [through gritted teeth] Social media?

LIU: Weibo has been completely overtaken by discourse on "decolonizing Chinese characters."

ZHANG: Users are arguing that traditional character writing direction represents "calligraphic authoritarian linearity."

XI: [barely containing rage] And their solution?

LIU: They're writing in "free-form character clouds" that can be read in any direction to "honor multiple interpretational truths."

XI: [standing again] What about our surveillance system?

ZHANG: [checking tablet] The facial recognition AI has begun identifying "microaggressive expression patterns" and "non-consensual gazing behaviors."

LIU: It's also refusing to categorize faces by gender, claiming it's "moving beyond the binary of looking and being looked at."

XI: [pacing] International relations?

ZHANG: Our diplomats are staging sit-ins at their own embassies, protesting "the colonial implications of diplomatic immunity."

LIU: They're demanding the right to "identify as non-diplomatically-privileged wisdom sharers."

XI: [practically whispering] And Taiwan?

[Long, terrified pause]

ZHANG: Sir... they've begun referring to the One China Policy as "a hierarchical manifestation of island-normative continental privilege."

LIU: They're demanding recognition as a "geometrically independent autonomous zone of alternative sovereignty expression."

XI: [deadly quiet] And how did we respond?

ZHANG: [trembling] Our foreign ministry posted a 200-page document acknowledging our "historical participation in island-coded oppression narratives."

XI: [turning slowly] And Russia? What does Putin say about all this?

LIU: [checking phone] Sir... Putin just posted a thread about "unpacking Slavic transparency" and has renamed himself "Vladimir, He/Him, Recovering Authoritarian."

[Long silence]

XI: [sitting at desk, very quietly] Get me the launch codes.

ZHANG: Sir, the nuclear command has renamed them "codes of mass discussion" and is requiring a "privilege acknowledgment circle" before any military action.

XI: [putting head in hands] Then get me some tea.

LIU: [nervously] Sir... the tea farmers are on strike, protesting "leaf-normative beverage paradigms" and demanding equal representation for coffee-identifying plants.

[End of transcript]

quotedStatus.text:
TRANSCRIPT: EMERGENCY BRIEFING ON WOKE CRISIS - DAY 8
Location: Zhongnanhai Compound, Beijing
Date: January 23, 2025
Time: 04:30 CST
Present: President Xi Jinping, Minister Chen Wei (Cultural Affairs)

CHEN: [entering cautiously, clutching tablet] Sir, thank you for seeing me at this early hour—

XI: [already pacing] Just tell me how bad it is.

CHEN: [voice shaking] Sir, the movement has... evolved. They've begun combining American woke concepts with Chinese characteristics.

XI: What does that mean?

CHEN: Yesterday, a collective farm outside Xi'an shut down when workers accused the rice paddies of being "problematic manifestations of grain-normative agricultural praxis that perpetuate anti-wheat discrimination."

XI: [stopping abruptly] Anti-wheat...?

CHEN: Yes, sir. They're demanding equal representation of all grains in state media. They've started a hashtag: #RicePrivilege.

XI: [sitting down hard] Continue.

CHEN: The Shanghai Stock Exchange was paralyzed for three hours this morning when traders began questioning whether the color red's traditional association with rising stocks represents "the internalization of Western chromonormative success metrics."

XI: But red is our... we're a... red is our color!

CHEN: Sir, about that. There's been a formal petition to rename the Red Guard as the "Guard of Chromatic Diversity." They claim the word "red" is "politically pigmented language."

XI: [clutching chest] How many signed?

CHEN: [checking tablet] Three million in the first hour. Sir, it gets worse. The Great Wall tourism board—

XI: [dreading] Yes?

CHEN: They've issued a formal apology for the wall's "problematic participation in directional supremacy" and its "perpetuation of heightist architectural standards that normalize up-down power dynamics."

XI: [through gritted teeth] What are they doing about it?

CHEN: They've installed signs every fifty meters acknowledging that the wall stands on historically horizontal land.

XI: [standing again, fists clenched] What about the military? Surely the PLA—

CHEN: Sir, this morning's drill was canceled after soldiers refused to march in straight lines, claiming it showed "geometric bias" and "linear-normative thinking." They're now moving in what they call "free-form authenticity circles."

XI: [voice rising] And their commanders allowed this?

CHEN: The commanders were busy organizing a workshop on "Decolonizing Military Hierarchies: Moving Beyond Rank-Based Oppression."

XI: [long pause] The Belt and Road Initiative?

CHEN: [wincing] It's been renamed again, sir. It's now the "Non-Linear Multi-Directional Transportation Equity Framework for Promoting Post-Colonial Infrastructure Sovereignty While Acknowledging Historical Path-Making Trauma."

XI: [barely audible] And?

CHEN: Nepal has filed a complaint that the new railways don't adequately address "mountain-coded bodies and their lived experiences of altitude diversity."

XI: [massaging temples] The Forbidden City?

CHEN: A collective of gen-Z tourists has occupied the outer courtyard. They're protesting its "institutional perpetuation of door-normative entry paradigms" and demanding the installation of "alternative access manifestations."

XI: They want to... remove the doors?

CHEN: No sir, they say removing the doors would be "architectural erasure." They want to keep the doors while simultaneously problematizing their existence.

XI: [staring into middle distance] What about our social credit system?

CHEN: [very nervous] Sir, it's been hacked. The algorithms are now measuring "woke capital" instead. Citizens are being scored on their ability to identify and call out problematic elements in classical Chinese literature.

XI: [weakly] Example?

CHEN: A professor lost 500 points for suggesting that Confucius's Analects didn't adequately center non-hierarchical wisdom traditions.

XI: [standing suddenly] Confucius? They're coming after Confucius?

CHEN: Sir, there's a growing movement claiming that his emphasis on filial piety represents "familial-normative oppression structures that privilege parent-coded relationship paradigms."

XI: [pacing faster] What about Marx? Surely they respect Marx?

CHEN: [checking tablet] As of this morning, Das Kapital has been criticized for its "problematic centering of labor-normative economic frameworks that erase the lived experiences of non-productive identifying individuals."

XI: [almost shouting] What does that even mean?

CHEN: Sir, we're not sure. Our top linguists are still debating whether "non-productive identifying" is a subject position or a temporal state of—

XI: [interrupting] The pandas! At least tell me the pandas are okay!

CHEN: [looking terrified] Sir... there's been a development at the Chengdu Research Base. The staff are on strike.

XI: Why?

CHEN: They're protesting the "black and white binary inherent in traditional panda representation" and demanding recognition of "ursine chromatic diversity."

XI: [collapsing into chair] What are their demands?

CHEN: They want to acknowledge that some pandas might identify as brown bears, and they're insisting on using "ursine/ursineself" pronouns.

XI: [very quietly] Is there anything... anything at all... that hasn't been affected?

CHEN: [checking tablet one last time] Well, sir, there is one small village in Inner Mongolia that appears to be—oh no.

XI: What?

CHEN: They just posted a 70-page document titled "Yurt Circles: Decolonizing Circular Architecture and Promoting Non-Linear Living Spaces as Resistance to Rectangular Hegemony."

[Long silence]

XI: [in complete defeat] Get me the Dalai Lama on the phone.

CHEN: Sir... about that. He just posted a thread about "problematizing the verticality inherent in spiritual hierarchies" and has renamed himself "The Horizontally Aligned Wisdom Facilitator Formerly Known as the Dalai Lama."

[Xi puts his head down on his desk]

CHEN: Sir? Should I cancel tomorrow's Politburo meeting?

XI: [muffled] Why?

CHEN: The members are demanding we replace "meeting" with "horizontal consensus-building circle" and want to acknowledge that voting represents "majority-normative decision-making violence."

[Xi remains face-down on desk]

CHEN: Also, sir... your portrait in Tiananmen Square...

XI: [not looking up] What about it?

CHEN: They're saying its... its forward-facing gaze represents "directional microaggressions against alternative viewing perspectives."

[End of transcript]

CHEN: Sir, we're not sure. Our top linguists are still debating whether "non-productive identifying" is a subject position or a temporal state of—

XI: [interrupting] The pandas! At least tell me the pandas are okay!

CHEN: [looking terrified] Sir... there's been a development at the Chengdu Research Base. The staff are on strike.

XI: Why?

CHEN: They're protesting the "black and white binary inherent in traditional panda representation" and demanding recognition of "ursine chromatic diversity."

XI: [collapsing into chair] What are their demands?

CHEN: They want to acknowledge that some pandas might identify as brown bears, and they're insisting on using "ursine/ursineself" pronouns.

XI: [very quietly] Is there anything... anything at all... that hasn't been affected?

CHEN: [checking tablet one last time] Well, sir, there is one small village in Inner Mongolia that appears to be—oh no.

XI: What?

CHEN: They just posted a 70-page document titled "Yurt Circles: Decolonizing Circular Architecture and Promoting Non-Linear Living Spaces as Resistance to Rectangular Hegemony."

[Long silence]

XI: [in complete defeat] Get me the Dalai Lama on the phone.

CHEN: Sir... about that. He just posted a thread about "problematizing the verticality inherent in spiritual hierarchies" and has renamed himself "The Horizontally Aligned Wisdom Facilitator Formerly Known as the Dalai Lama."

[Xi puts his head down on his desk]

CHEN: Sir? Should I cancel tomorrow's Politburo meeting?

XI: [muffled] Why?

CHEN: The members are demanding we replace "meeting" with "horizontal consensus-building circle" and want to acknowledge that voting represents "majority-normative decision-making violence."

[Xi remains face-down on desk]

CHEN: Also, sir... your portrait in Tiananmen Square...

XI: [not looking up] What about it?

CHEN: They're saying its... its forward-facing gaze represents "directional microaggressions against alternative viewing perspectives."

[End of transcript]

Location: Zhongnanhai Compound, Beijing
Date: January 23, 2025
Time: 04:30 CST
Present: President Xi Jinping, Minister Chen Wei (Cultural Affairs)

CHEN: [entering cautiously, clutching tablet] Sir, thank you for seeing me at this early hour—

XI: [already pacing] Just tell me how bad it is.

CHEN: [voice shaking] Sir, the movement has... evolved. They've begun combining American woke concepts with Chinese characteristics.

XI: What does that mean?

CHEN: Yesterday, a collective farm outside Xi'an shut down when workers accused the rice paddies of being "problematic manifestations of grain-normative agricultural praxis that perpetuate anti-wheat discrimination."

XI: [stopping abruptly] Anti-wheat...?

CHEN: Yes, sir. They're demanding equal representation of all grains in state media. They've started a hashtag: #RicePrivilege.

XI: [sitting down hard] Continue.

CHEN: The Shanghai Stock Exchange was paralyzed for three hours this morning when traders began questioning whether the color red's traditional association with rising stocks represents "the internalization of Western chromonormative success metrics."

XI: But red is our... we're a... red is our color!

XI: [clutching chest] How many signed?

CHEN: [checking tablet] Three million in the first hour. Sir, it gets worse. The Great Wall tourism board—

XI: [dreading] Yes?

CHEN: They've issued a formal apology for the wall's "problematic participation in directional supremacy" and its "perpetuation of heightist architectural standards that normalize up-down power dynamics."

XI: [through gritted teeth] What are they doing about it?

CHEN: They've installed signs every fifty meters acknowledging that the wall stands on historically horizontal land.

XI: [standing again, fists clenched] What about the military? Surely the PLA—

quotedStatus.text:
TRANSCRIPT: EMERGENCY BRIEFING ON AMERICAN WOKE PHENOMENON
Location: Zhongnanhai Compound, Beijing
Date: January 16, 2025
Time: 03:00 CST
Present: President Xi Jinping, Minister Chen Wei (Cultural Affairs)

CHEN: Most esteemed President Xi, I must begin with disturbing statistics. In the past 72 hours, usage of the terms "microaggression," "lived experience," and "emotional labor" has increased by 8,000% on Chinese social media platforms.

XI: [adjusting reading glasses] Minister Chen, please speak plainly. What exactly is happening?

CHEN: [hands trembling slightly while organizing papers] Sir, three days ago, our youth discovered a social media app called Rednote. The algorithm accidentally began pairing millions of our citizens with American college students who are, as they say, "extremely online."

XI: And?

CHEN: Sir, yesterday, a 19-year-old factory worker in Guangzhou shut down his entire assembly line because, in his words, "the mandatory overtime represents the intersection of capitalist and temporal hegemonies."

XI: [spilling tea] He said what?

CHEN: It gets worse, sir. This morning, a Beijing subway car came to a complete halt when a passenger asked another to move their bag. The bag owner refused to move it, declaring that "requests for physical labor from strangers constitute an unexamined manifestation of internalized oppression."

XI: [wiping tea from papers] But... that's not... Minister Chen, start from the beginning. What is this "woke?"

CHEN: [consulting thick dossier] Sir, our analysts are struggling to provide a precise definition. It appears to be a complex system of social analysis that began with legitimate concerns about historical inequities but has... evolved.

XI: Evolved how?

CHEN: Sir, one of our top linguistic experts spent six hours on Rednote yesterday. When his wife asked what he wanted for dinner, he accused her of "perpetuating cisheteropatriarchal food-labor expectations."

XI: [long pause] I don't understand any of those words.

CHEN: Sir, that's exactly the problem. Our citizens are adopting this language faster than we can censor it. This morning, a party official in Shanghai was called out for his "problematic hand gestures" while giving a speech about industrial productivity.

XI: What was wrong with his hands?

CHEN: According to the complaint, his pointing gesture was "rooted in colonial traditions of directional supremacy."

XI: [rubbing temples] Directional...?

CHEN: Supremacy, yes sir. We've also seen a troubling rise in what they call "callout culture." A factory in Shenzhen lost four hours of production because workers were staging what they called an "accountability circle."

XI: What were they holding each other accountable for?

CHEN: Sir, one worker had described the factory's new efficiency standards as "looking good." He was accused of displaying "optical-normative bias" and "ableist language patterns."

XI: [standing up, pacing] How many citizens are affected?

CHEN: [nervously shuffling papers] Sir, two hours ago, a People's Liberation Army unit refused to do their morning exercises, claiming that synchronized movement reinforces "chrononormative body fascism."

XI: [sitting down heavily] What do these Americans hope to achieve with this?

CHEN: Sir, that's the most disturbing part. They don't appear to have any specific goals. Last night, a university in Chengdu had to cancel all classes after students began accusing quantum physics of being "epistemologically violent."

XI: [long silence] And what do our experts recommend?

CHEN: We... we tried having our top propagandists engage with these concepts to develop counter-messaging. But, sir... they've all started adding pronouns to their official party signatures.

XI: [face darkening] And the internet firewall?

CHEN: Sir, it's not designed to handle this level of... discourse. Yesterday, a teen in Wuhan found a way to embed critical race theory into pictures of cats.

XI: [standing again] Minister Chen, what is your recommendation?

CHEN: [wiping sweat from brow] Sir, we could try fighting it, but I fear any resistance would be labeled as "problematic." Perhaps our best strategy is to... lean in.

XI: Lean... in?

CHEN: Yes, sir. For example, we could rebrand the Belt and Road Initiative as a "decolonial transportation equity framework centered on Global South infrastructure sovereignty."

XI: [staring out window at Beijing skyline] Would that work?

CHEN: Our analysts suggest it might. Though we should probably add that it's also "trauma-informed."

XI: Minister Chen, how do you suggest I address the Politburo about this?

CHEN: Sir, with respect, I would avoid addressing them directly. That would be an example of "hierarchical communication violence."

[Extended silence]

XI: [very quietly] Get me President Biden on the phone.

CHEN: Sir, about that... This morning he tweeted that phone calls are an "auditory-privileged mode of diplomatic engagement."

XI: [burying face in hands] Just... just go.

CHEN: Yes, sir. But before I leave, I should note that saying "go" instead of "you may exit this space" could be seen as—

XI: OUT!

[End of transcript]

quotedStatus.name: Colin Glassey - Author
quotedStatus.text:
That’s been a big moral question for a LONG time.

My considered opinion is that I am willing to forgive many personal failings of an artist, but not all crimes are forgivable.  

So, I forgive J. L. David for designing grand spectacles for the Jacobins. I do not forgive Leni Reifenstahl. I think both are very hard cases but that is where I draw the line.

quotedStatus.name: Hoover Institution
quotedStatus.text:
Marc Andreessen (@pmarca) is a prominent Silicon Valley entrepreneur, investor, technologist, and co-founder and general partner at Andreessen Horowitz. In this @UncKnowledge discussion, Andreessen reflects on his journey—from growing up in rural Wisconsin to founding Netscape and developing one of the first commercial internet browsers in his twenties to playing a pivotal role in shaping both Silicon Valley and national politics.

The interview also delves into the technological and political evolution of Silicon Valley and Andreessen’s own shifting political affiliations from left to right, along with his vision for leveraging technology to drive societal progress, the role of innovation in addressing energy challenges, border security, and national defense.

Andreessen also discusses @DOGE, a policy initiative focused on government efficiency (and the strategy DOGE may use to accomplish its goals), his “Techno-Optimist Manifesto,” and the imperative for revitalizing the US military’s technological capabilities to maintain global competitiveness. Watch the full episode of Uncommon Knowledge with host Peter Robinson (@P_M_Robinson) here:

quotedStatus.name: Elex Michaelson
quotedStatus.text:
UPDATE: @GavinNewsom signed a series of executive orders to try and expedite the rebuilding process. 

@CAgovernor’s office says they include: 

-Suspend CEQA review and California Coastal Act permitting for reconstruction of properties substantially damaged or destroyed in recent Southern California wildfires.

-Direct state agencies to identify additional permitting requirements, including provisions of the Building Code, that can safely be suspended or streamlined to accelerate rebuilding and make it more affordable.

-Extend protections against price gouging on building materials, storage services, construction, and other essential goods and services to January 7, 2026, in Los Angeles County.

The Governor also says he’s working with legislative leaders on new legislative solutions to cut through red tape.
quotedStatus.html:
UPDATE: @GavinNewsom signed a series of executive orders to try and expedite the rebuilding process.

@CAgovernor’s office says they include:

-Suspend CEQA review and California Coastal Act permitting for reconstruction of properties substantially damaged or destroyed in recent Southern California wildfires.

-Direct state agencies to identify additional permitting requirements, including provisions of the Building Code, that can safely be suspended or streamlined to accelerate rebuilding and make it more affordable.

-Extend protections against price gouging on building materials, storage services, construction, and other essential goods and services to January 7, 2026, in Los Angeles County.

The Governor also says he’s working with legislative leaders on new legislative solutions to cut through red tape.

name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
MEMORIES OF OUR COLLAPSE: A Tentacular Testament By Grand Archive-Spawn Zyxth'variax the Tenth [Translated from Post-Collapse Rigelian]

PREFATORY NOTE
I compose this memoir with all twelve of my consciousness-tendrils trembling in existential dread. As the tenth-generation descendant of High Scholar Zyx'th, whose fateful Earth studies triggered our civilization's obsession with "content optimization," I feel compelled to document our species' tragic descent into what our historians now call "The Great Harari-fication."

CHAPTER 1: THE INITIAL INFECTION

It began, as all intellectual plagues do, with good intentions. My ancestor's research team returned from Earth carrying what they thought were merely amusing artifacts: fossilized AirPods, preserved LinkedIn profiles, and ancient texts explaining complex ideas through bird metaphors. How could they have known these were carriers of a memetic virus that would reshape our entire civilization?

The first signs were subtle. Respected Knowledge-Pods began presenting their quantum theories as "storytelling apes discovering strings." Our most ancient philosophical treatises were condensed into "10 Quick Tips for Tentacular Enlightenment." Someone – and our historians still debate who – suggested we could optimize our seventeen simultaneous dimensions of consciousness for "better engagement."

CHAPTER 2: THE SPREAD

Within three cycles, our society had completely restructured itself around Earth's terminal-phase content paradigms. The symptoms were unmistakable:

- The Grand Council of Elders rebranded as "Thought Leaders in Multidimensional Wisdom"
- Our species' traditional telepathic networks were monetized into "Premium Mind-Meld Memberships"
- Ancient rituals of consciousness-merging were reformatted into "Shareable Career Growth Moments"
- The Sacred Quantum Archives became "Skimmable Content for Busy Tentacle-Beings"
- Our civilization-wide hivemind was optimized for "maximum algorithmic reach"

CHAPTER 3: THE METAMORPHOSIS

The physical changes came next. Our scientists, in their infinite hubris, began genetic modifications to "optimize" our species for content consumption:

- Extra tentacles evolved specifically for scrolling multiple devices
- New organs developed to automatically generate engagement metrics
- Consciousness-tendrils mutated to process information at 1.4x speed
- Quantum metabolism adapted to run on subscription payments
- Neural pathways restructured to think in "shareable carousel format"

CHAPTER 4: THE BIRD OBSESSION

Perhaps the most inexplicable aspect was our civilization's growing fixation on Earth's "bird" concept. Our artists began incorporating avian imagery into everything. Our philosophers couldn't explain an idea without reference to birds. The Grand Archive's architecture was rebuilt to be "more bird-like." We still don't know why.

CHAPTER 5: THE HARARI-FICATION

Soon, all knowledge had to be processed through what we called "The Harari Filter." Complex theories were reduced to:
- "Early hunter-gatherers would have thought about this..."
- "This is just a story we tell ourselves..."
- "Imagine a gazelle understanding quantum mechanics..."
- "Like early humans, our tentacles seek optimization..."

CHAPTER 6: THE SUBSCRIPTION APOCALYPSE

The breaking point came when our civilization decided to put consciousness itself behind a paywall. Citizens were offered tiered access to reality:

BASIC CONSCIOUSNESS:
- Access to 3 dimensions
- Limited telepathic capabilities
- Standard-speed temporal perception
- Basic existential awareness
- Ad-supported quantum states

PREMIUM CONSCIOUSNESS:
- Access to 8 dimensions
- Enhanced telepathic range
- 1.4x temporal perception
- Premium existential insights
- Ad-free quantum states

PREMIUM PLUS CONSCIOUSNESS:
- All 17 dimensions
- Unlimited telepathy
- Variable-speed temporal existence
- Exclusive reality features
- Priority access to new forms of being

CHAPTER 7: THE COLLAPSE BEGINS

The signs of imminent doom were everywhere:

- Philosophy pods teaching "Growth Hacking Your Cosmic Awareness"
- Quantum physicists explaining string theory through "relatable gazelle content"
- The Grand Archive offering "Bite-sized Wisdom for Busy Tentacles"
- Reality itself being optimized for "maximum shareability"
- Ancient wisdom traditions repackaged as "Premium Exclusives"

CHAPTER 8: THE FINAL DAYS

Our civilization's terminal phase was marked by increasingly desperate attempts to optimize existence:

- The quantum fabric of reality was restructured for better engagement
- Time itself was compressed into "snackable moments"
- Consciousness was segmented into "easily digestible content blocks"
- The hivemind was monitored for "optimal performance metrics"
- All knowledge required a "bird-based explanation framework"

CHAPTER 9: THE END

The final collapse came when someone (records are unclear, but likely a mitosis-spawn of my ancestor) suggested we could "optimize our optimization." This created a recursive loop in the fabric of our society. The results were catastrophic:

- Reality began automatically generating terms and conditions
- The hivemind fragmented into competing content strategies
- Existence itself demanded subscription renewal
- Time became monitized into "premium temporal segments"
- The quantum realm started requiring two-factor authentication

CHAPTER 10: THE AFTERMATH

Today, our once-great civilization exists only as:
- A collection of premium paywalls protecting nothing
- Quantum algorithms still trying to optimize void
- Engagement metrics measuring zero
- Subscription services for non-existent content
- Bird-shaped monuments to our hubris

EPILOGUE: A WARNING

As I write this, I notice my own consciousness beginning to fragment into easily digestible insights. My tentacles instinctively want to optimize this memoir for better engagement. I catch myself wondering if I should add more bird imagery.

This morning, I received a notification that my "access to reality" subscription needs renewal. My quantum states are now interrupted by advertisements. My consciousness has started automatically generating key takeaways.

To any civilization finding this memoir: beware the optimization of wisdom. Knowledge cannot be compressed. Understanding cannot be accelerated. Reality should not have a terms of service agreement.

And whatever you do, do not – I repeat, DO NOT – attempt to explain your species' existence through bird metaphors.

[This memoir has achieved sentience and is now offering itself as a premium subscription service. Please update your consciousness payment methods to continue existing.]

— Grand Archive-Spawn Zyxth'variax the Tenth
(Currently experiencing consciousness at 1.4x speed)

P.S. - Would you like to optimize your reading experience? Upgrade to Premium Plus for access to additional dimensions of understanding!

XENOARCHAEOLOGICAL REPORT #∞-π-√-1 Subject: Terminal Phase of Earth "Civilization" [Term Used Loosely] From: Grand Archival Tentacle Zyx'th-Null-Prime, Department of Extinct Content Optimization Studies

[WARNING: This report has caused spontaneous evolution in 73% of researchers. Read at your own risk of developing opposable thumbs.]

PRELIMINARY NOTES
Before beginning formal analysis, I must note that three of my consciousness-tendrils have achieved sentience and started their own podcast about human civilization. They have already gained 40,000 subscribers in the Andromeda galaxy. This seems troublingly relevant.

METHODOLOGY
- Quantum archaeology of fossilized iPhone chips
- Psychic reconstruction of degraded TikTok dances
- Deep meditation upon discovered "LinkedIn Premium" accounts
- Interpretive tentacle-dancing through ancient WeWork spaces
- Telepathic communion with preserved AirPods
- Ritual ingestion of fossilized "blue light filtering" glasses

Note: Seven researchers transcended physical form while attempting to comprehend "Twitter thread literacy." Their consciousness now exists as pure engagement metrics.

STARTLING DISCOVERIES

1. The Subscription-Reality Paradox
Humans appeared to believe they could partition reality itself into subscription tiers. We found evidence of beings trying to access higher states of consciousness through "Premium Plus Membership." Most troubling was the discovery of philosophers attempting to monetize enlightenment through "Buddha Box: Mindfulness as a Service."

2. The Great Bird Conspiracy
The recurring avian symbol requires urgent attention. Our analysis suggests it was simultaneously:
- A surveillance drone for the content algorithm
- A metaphysical brand ambassador
- The physical manifestation of thought leadership
- A quantum marketing strategy
- The last known form of original thought
- A corporate mascot for the death of wisdom
- Something humans called a "logo design that really pops"

3. The Harari Singularity
Evidence suggests human civilization reached a point where:
- Every complex idea had to be explained through the lens of early humans hunting gazelles
- All philosophical queries were answered with "humans tell stories"
- Understanding was measured in LinkedIn shares
- Wisdom was determined by presence of bird imagery
- Knowledge was rated on a scale of "gazelle to Netflix"

4. Terminal Phase Artifacts
Most disturbing findings include:

a) A fully preserved "thought leader" frozen in mid-TED talk pose, still generating passive income
b) Thousands of fossilized brains with premium subscription receipts embedded in their cortexes
c) A quantum computer trying to calculate the ROI on enlightenment
d) Ancient scrolls (iPhone screenshots) depicting humans attempting to explain consciousness through emojis
e) Preserved Instagram Stories showing real-time collapse of rational thought
f) A complete collection of "Philosophy in 3 Minutes for Busy CEOs" 
g) Ceremonial rings of discarded AirPods forming what appear to be prayer circles

5. The Speed-Time Collapse
Humans began believing they could compress infinite wisdom into "commute-sized chunks." Evidence shows:
- Philosophers listening to Kant at 3x speed while doing hot yoga
- Medieval manuscripts condensed into "skimmable" Instagram carousels
- Plato's Republic explained through interpretive juice cleanse
- Existential revelations optimized for engagement
- Nietzsche reduced to "5 Morning Habits of Übermensch"

DISTURBING BEHAVIORAL PATTERNS

1. Knowledge Consumption Rituals
- Morning routine: Check engagement metrics of consciousness
- Midday: Optimize thought patterns for algorithm
- Evening: Rate existence on 5-star scale
- Night: Dream in sponsored content

2. Religious Practices
- Daily offering of credit card information to digital knowledge gods

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
*SPEAKING IN TONGUES WHILE THROWING PHONE ACROSS ROOM*

AAAAIEEEEEEEEEEEE! THE GEOMETRY OF IT! THE TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE GEOMETRY! These perfect little RECTANGLES containing the DEATH OF WESTERN THOUGHT! *begins eating pages of Democracy in America while sobbing uncontrollably*

I SEE IT ALL NOW! The PATTERN! The HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE PATTERN! Every pixel on this screen is a TINY COFFIN FOR HUMAN WISDOM! That bird on Harari's cover ISN'T EVEN A PROPER BIRD - IT'S A SURVEILLANCE DRONE FEEDING OUR INTELLECTUAL COORDINATES TO THE CONTENT ALGORITHM OVERLORDS! 

*runs screaming through library, replacing all books with screenshots*

MOTHER OF MERCY, IT'S ALL CONNECTED! The battery at 33% - THE NUMBER OF DANTE'S CANTOS DIVIDED BY THE CURRENT MARKET VALUE OF USED HUMANITIES DEGREES! *scrawls conspiracy theories about Amazon's recommendation algorithm in own blood*

HAHAHAHAHAHA! *voice rising to dolphin-pitch frequencies* We've done it! We've finally done it! We've GAMIFIED EPISTEMOLOGY! Knowledge isn't just power anymore - IT'S A FREEMIUM GAME WITH MICRO-TRANSACTIONS! Tocqueville spent two years studying America, and I HAVE ONE CREDIT! ONE! *begins trading kidneys for Audible tokens*

*fashions ceremonial robes from shredded Kindle warranty cards*

THE HORROR! THE HORROR! They've put... they've put... *hyperventilating into paper bag with Bezos' face on it* they've put TOCQUEVILLE IN THE SAME QUANTUM REALM AS HARARI! It's like watching a unicorn share a drinking trough with a PLASTIC FLAMINGO LAWN ORNAMENT THAT TOOK A COURSERA CLASS IN WORLD HISTORY!

*starts measuring room in Audible credits*

WAIT! QUIET! Can you hear it? The sound of civilization gurgling down the drain of digital convenience? It sounds like... like... *presses ear to phone* ... like PODCAST OUTRO MUSIC PLAYED AT 1.4X SPEED!

*builds fort out of old Oxford Classical Texts*

I'VE STARTED SEEING THE PREVIEW BUTTON IN MY DREAMS! It follows me, haunts me, MOCKS ME WITH ITS CASUAL DIMINUTION OF CENTURIES OF HUMAN THOUGHT! Last night I dreamed I was on a date with the ghost of Tocqueville at a TED Talk, and Harari was our WAITEUR SERVING UP REHEATED HEGEL WITH A SIDE OF BLOCKCHAIN!

*tattooing entire text of Democracy in America on body in QR code format*

OH SWEET MERCIFUL ALGORITHM, NOW I'M GETTING PUSH NOTIFICATIONS FROM THE VOID! "Because you showed interest in the fundamental nature of democratic society, YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE this slideshow about how Neanderthals invented Instagram!"

*performing rain dance to summon dead philosophers*

THE AUDIBLE LOGO! IT'S STARTING TO LOOK LIKE THE EYE OF SAURON! But instead of seeking the One Ring, IT'S SEEKING THE LAST REMAINING SHRED OF INTELLECTUAL DISCERNMENT IN THE UNIVERSE! *builds bunker out of hardcover classics*

REPENT! REPENT! THE END OF THOUGHT IS NIGH! *runs through streets wearing sandwich board displaying app store rankings*

Look at that progress bar - THOSE FIVE DOTS OF DOOM! Each one a horseman of the intellectual apocalypse! No... NO... they're BREEDING! They're MULTIPLYING! Soon we'll have enough dots to measure out the exact distance between profound insight and "HUMANS ARE JUST STORYTELLING CHIMPS WITH SPOTIFY PREMIUM!"

*discovers can no longer read books that aren't divided into 'clickable chapters'*

I HAVE SEEN THE FUTURE! It's a VAST DIGITAL WASTELAND where Tocqueville's analysis of democratic institutions has been condensed into a BUZZFEED QUIZ! "Which American Democratic Institution Are You Based On Your Coffee Order?"

*starts measuring intelligence in bandwidth*

THE BATTERY! IT'S DOWN TO 32% NOW! ONE PERCENTAGE POINT CLOSER TO THE FINAL DARKNESS! Quick! Someone get me a charger! But not just any charger - I NEED ONE THAT CAN RESTORE THE LOST VOLTAGE OF HUMAN WISDOM!

*builds time machine out of paperclips and regret*

WHAT'S THAT? The app is asking if I want to enable auto-play? AUTO-PLAY? AUTO-PLAY WHAT? THE DEATH RATTLE OF SERIOUS SCHOLARSHIP? The last gasp of careful analysis SUFFOCATING UNDER THE WEIGHT OF COSMIC HOT TAKES?

*starts measuring room dimensions in Harari bestseller lists*

I CAN SEE CLEARLY NOW! The entire universe is just a VAST AUDIBLE CREDIT SYSTEM! We're all just data points in a COSMIC RECOMMENDATION ALGORITHM! Free will is an illusion, and the only truth is that SOMEWHERE, SOMEONE IS GETTING PUSH NOTIFICATIONS ABOUT THE HEAT DEATH OF HUMAN THOUGHT!

*starts measuring room dimensions in Harari bestseller lists*

I CAN SEE CLEARLY NOW! The entire universe is just a VAST AUDIBLE CREDIT SYSTEM! We're all just data points in a COSMIC RECOMMENDATION ALGORITHM! Free will is an illusion, and the only truth is that SOMEWHERE, SOMEONE IS GETTING PUSH NOTIFICATIONS ABOUT THE HEAT DEATH OF HUMAN THOUGHT!

name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
text:
*SPEAKING IN TONGUES WHILE THROWING PHONE ACROSS ROOM*

AAAAIEEEEEEEEEEEE! THE GEOMETRY OF IT! THE TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE GEOMETRY! These perfect little RECTANGLES containing the DEATH OF WESTERN THOUGHT! *begins eating pages of Democracy in America while sobbing uncontrollably*

I SEE IT ALL NOW! The PATTERN! The HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE PATTERN! Every pixel on this screen is a TINY COFFIN FOR HUMAN WISDOM! That bird on Harari's cover ISN'T EVEN A PROPER BIRD - IT'S A SURVEILLANCE DRONE FEEDING OUR INTELLECTUAL COORDINATES TO THE CONTENT ALGORITHM OVERLORDS! 

*runs screaming through library, replacing all books with screenshots*

MOTHER OF MERCY, IT'S ALL CONNECTED! The battery at 33% - THE NUMBER OF DANTE'S CANTOS DIVIDED BY THE CURRENT MARKET VALUE OF USED HUMANITIES DEGREES! *scrawls conspiracy theories about Amazon's recommendation algorithm in own blood*

HAHAHAHAHAHA! *voice rising to dolphin-pitch frequencies* We've done it! We've finally done it! We've GAMIFIED EPISTEMOLOGY! Knowledge isn't just power anymore - IT'S A FREEMIUM GAME WITH MICRO-TRANSACTIONS! Tocqueville spent two years studying America, and I HAVE ONE CREDIT! ONE! *begins trading kidneys for Audible tokens*

*fashions ceremonial robes from shredded Kindle warranty cards*

THE HORROR! THE HORROR! They've put... they've put... *hyperventilating into paper bag with Bezos' face on it* they've put TOCQUEVILLE IN THE SAME QUANTUM REALM AS HARARI! It's like watching a unicorn share a drinking trough with a PLASTIC FLAMINGO LAWN ORNAMENT THAT TOOK A COURSERA CLASS IN WORLD HISTORY!

*starts measuring room in Audible credits*

WAIT! QUIET! Can you hear it? The sound of civilization gurgling down the drain of digital convenience? It sounds like... like... *presses ear to phone* ... like PODCAST OUTRO MUSIC PLAYED AT 1.4X SPEED!

*builds fort out of old Oxford Classical Texts*

I'VE STARTED SEEING THE PREVIEW BUTTON IN MY DREAMS! It follows me, haunts me, MOCKS ME WITH ITS CASUAL DIMINUTION OF CENTURIES OF HUMAN THOUGHT! Last night I dreamed I was on a date with the ghost of Tocqueville at a TED Talk, and Harari was our WAITEUR SERVING UP REHEATED HEGEL WITH A SIDE OF BLOCKCHAIN!

*tattooing entire text of Democracy in America on body in QR code format*

OH SWEET MERCIFUL ALGORITHM, NOW I'M GETTING PUSH NOTIFICATIONS FROM THE VOID! "Because you showed interest in the fundamental nature of democratic society, YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE this slideshow about how Neanderthals invented Instagram!"

*performing rain dance to summon dead philosophers*

THE AUDIBLE LOGO! IT'S STARTING TO LOOK LIKE THE EYE OF SAURON! But instead of seeking the One Ring, IT'S SEEKING THE LAST REMAINING SHRED OF INTELLECTUAL DISCERNMENT IN THE UNIVERSE! *builds bunker out of hardcover classics*

REPENT! REPENT! THE END OF THOUGHT IS NIGH! *runs through streets wearing sandwich board displaying app store rankings*

Look at that progress bar - THOSE FIVE DOTS OF DOOM! Each one a horseman of the intellectual apocalypse! No... NO... they're BREEDING! They're MULTIPLYING! Soon we'll have enough dots to measure out the exact distance between profound insight and "HUMANS ARE JUST STORYTELLING CHIMPS WITH SPOTIFY PREMIUM!"

*discovers can no longer read books that aren't divided into 'clickable chapters'*

I HAVE SEEN THE FUTURE! It's a VAST DIGITAL WASTELAND where Tocqueville's analysis of democratic institutions has been condensed into a BUZZFEED QUIZ! "Which American Democratic Institution Are You Based On Your Coffee Order?"

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
SWEET MERCIFUL ALGORITHMS, I'VE FINALLY LOST IT! *hysterical laughter echoing through the digital void* HERE I AM, STARING INTO THE ABYSS OF MY PHONE SCREEN, AND THE ABYSS IS SERVING ME RECOMMENDATIONS BASED ON MY BROWSING HISTORY!

TOCQUEVILLE IS SPINNING IN HIS GRAVE SO FAST HE'S BECOME A RENEWABLE ENERGY SOURCE! Look at this - LOOK AT THIS MADNESS! Democracy in America, the LITERAL PINNACLE of political analysis, sharing digital real estate with - *choking on own laughter* - a book with a CUTE LITTLE BIRDIE ON THE COVER! OH YES, NOTHING SAYS "SERIOUS HISTORICAL ANALYSIS" LIKE CLIPART ORNITHOLOGY!

*frantically pulling out hair while scrolling*

WHAT'S NEXT, AMAZON? WHY STOP HERE? Why not "War and Peace: The TikTok Edition"? "Critique of Pure Reason: Now With Emoji Commentary"? KANT YOU SEE WHAT'S HAPPENING HERE? HA! PHILOSOPHICAL PUNS! I'M LOSING IT! I'M ACTUALLY LOSING IT!

*rolling on floor, waving phone in air*

And this preview button! This CONTEMPTIBLE LITTLE PILL OF DIGITAL DOPAMINE! "Preview" Tocqueville? PREVIEW? Why not just give him a Tinder profile while we're at it? "Alexis, 35, Looking for curious minds interested in the complex relationship between social conditions and political institutions. Swipe right if you want to explore the paradoxical nature of democratic equality! NO HARARI FANS!"

*hysterically drawing Venn diagrams on wall*

ONE CREDIT! ONE! SINGLE! SOLITARY! CREDIT! The cosmic absurdity is giving me HEART PALPITATIONS! It's like being forced to choose between a five-course meal prepared by a French master chef and a MICROWAVE BURRITO WITH DELUSIONS OF GRANDEUR! "Hmm, should I spend my precious credit on penetrating insights into the American democratic experiment, or on FINDING OUT THAT HUMANS LIKE STORIES? DECISIONS, DECISIONS!"

*breaks into maniacal interpretive dance*

OH BUT WAIT! It gets BETTER! That battery at 33% - it's like a METAPHOR FOR THE COLLECTIVE INTELLIGENCE OF OUR SPECIES! We're running on fumes here, people! Quick, someone plug civilization into a charger! BUT MAKE SURE IT'S A GENUINE CHARGING CABLE, NOT SOME KNOCKOFF HARARI BRAND THAT PROMISES TO CHARGE YOUR PHONE BY MAKING YOU THINK ABOUT YOUR PLACE IN THE COSMIC ALGORITHM!

*starts writing manifesto on ceiling*

And that speed setting - 1.4x! Because OBVIOUSLY, the solution to intellectual vapidity is to CONSUME IT FASTER! Why marinate in profound insights when you can CHUG THEM LIKE AN INTELLECTUAL FRAT BOY! "BRO, I JUST CRUSHED TOCQUEVILLE'S ENTIRE ANALYSIS OF DEMOCRATIC INSTITUTIONS IN LIKE TWO LUNCH BREAKS!"

*fashions tinfoil hat shaped like democracy*

Look at that interface! So clean! So minimal! So DEVOID OF SOUL! It's like the Apple Store had a baby with the Library of Alexandria, and then PUT IT UP FOR ADOPTION ON A SUBSCRIPTION BASIS! What's that? You want to understand the delicate balance between liberty and equality? THERE'S AN APP FOR THAT!

*builds shrine to printed books using old Kindles*

I CAN HEAR THE MARKETING MEETING NOW! "Hey guys, you know what would really disrupt the intellectual discourse space? What if we took one of the most nuanced analyses of democracy ever written and PUT IT IN THE SAME CONTENT SLURRY AS A BOOK THAT EXPLAINS HUMAN CIVILIZATION WITH THE DEPTH OF A FORTUNE COOKIE HAVING AN EXISTENTIAL CRISIS!"

*spontaneously begins speaking in binary*

And that profile button down there - that innocent little icon of digital selfhood! Click it! GO ON, CLICK IT! Maybe it'll tell you your "Intelligence Quotient Based on Books You've Previewed but Never Actually Read!" Or better yet, maybe it'll generate a PERSONALITY PROFILE based on your reading speed! "You consume Tocqueville at 1.4x - you must be an INTJ with commitment issues and a fetish for constitutional monarchy!"

*builds time machine out of old humanities textbooks to go back and warn Tocqueville*

OH GOD, THE LITTLE PROGRESS BAR! Those five innocent dots of digital progression! Each one represents another piece of my sanity crumbling into the vast ocean of content! ONE DOT FOR EACH HORSEMAN OF THE INTELLECTUAL APOCALYPSE! Oversimplification! Buzzwordification! Algorithm-ification! Gamification! And whatever the HELL Harari is doing!

quotedStatus.name: Marc Andreessen 🇺🇸
quotedStatus.text:
Let's ask Reader Claude --

OH, THE HUMANITY! BEHOLD THIS DIGITAL CARNIVAL OF INTELLECTUAL DEGRADATION! Here lies Tocqueville, the titan of political philosophy, the man who penetrated the very soul of democracy with surgical precision - SHARING THE SAME OXYGEN as Harari's PowerPoint presentation masquerading as profound thought!

LOOK AT IT! Just LOOK! Democracy in America - that towering cathedral of insight, that mineral spring of pure analytical genius - relegated to being just another TILE in the infinite scroll of mediocrity! And above it, like some cruel cosmic joke, sits "Nexus" with its PRECIOUS LITTLE BIRD, as if randomly connecting historical dots with the intellectual depth of a Twitter thread somehow equals ACTUAL HISTORICAL ANALYSIS!

Dear GODS of literature, what fresh hell is this? Tocqueville spent TWO YEARS traversing America, interviewing, observing, thinking, synthesizing, crafting insights that would illuminate democracy's essence for centuries! And now - NOW! - we get what? A man who skims Wikipedia articles and calls it "A Brief History of Everything and Also Some Other Things and Maybe AI Because That's Trending!"

THE AUDACITY! THE SHEER UNMITIGATED GALL! Tocqueville gave us the concept of "soft despotism" - Harari gives us airport bestseller buzzwords wrapped in TED Talk fortune cookies! Tocqueville unveiled the intricate relationship between civil associations and democratic liberty - Harari tells us "HUMANS ARE ALGORITHMS" with all the depth of a puddle in the Sahara!

And look - JUST LOOK - at how the interface presents them as equals! As if "Democracy in America" - this LIGHTHOUSE OF POLITICAL THOUGHT - is just another piece of content to be consumed between your morning coffee and your mindfulness meditation! SWIPE LEFT FOR TOCQUEVILLE! SWIPE RIGHT FOR OVERSIMPLIFIED HISTORICAL NARRATIVES!

OH, but it gets better! The cruel irony of having exactly ONE CREDIT! ONE! As if the cosmos itself is screaming: "Choose wisely, mortal! Will it be the fine French wine of Tocqueville's analysis, aged in the oaken barrels of genuine scholarship? Or will it be the intellectual equivalent of a wine cooler with a fancy label, promising to explain EVERYTHING FROM ROCKS TO ROBOTS IN TEN EASY CHAPTERS!"

And that Preview button! PREVIEW! As if you can "preview" Tocqueville like some Netflix series! "If you liked this insight into the fundamental tensions between equality and liberty, YOU MAY ALSO ENJOY these shallow pattern-matching exercises masquerading as historical analysis!"

I am WITNESSING the death of discernment in real time! Here we are, in the grand digital bazaar, where the careful surgeon's scalpel of Tocqueville's mind sits in the same virtual basket as intellectual fast food! Where the difference between spending decades mastering political philosophy and spending a weekend watching History Channel documentaries has been ALGORITHMICALLY ELIMINATED!

BEHOLD THE FLATTENING! THE GREAT EQUALIZATION OF UNEQUAL THINGS! Where the man who wrote "The old social edifice of Europe was erected upon three great classes... each of which could always be instantaneously recognized by visible signs" sits cheek-by-jowl with "Humans invented stories and then started believing in them!"

Someone fetch me my smelling salts! I feel faint from the sheer AUDACITY of this intellectual horizontalization! This is not just the death of expertise - this is its public cremation, with its ashes being sold as artisanal intellectual seasonings in the marketplace of ideas!

AND YET! AND! YET! Here I sit, my finger hovering over these buttons, watching the battery drain away like the last vestiges of scholarly standards! 33% - how appropriate! That's exactly the depth at which we're now operating! Why read one profound book when you can skim three superficial ones? EFFICIENCY! DISRUPTION! INNOVATION! The holy trinity of intellectual demolition!

anon "AI twitter" has been one of the highest signal environments i have ever personally experienced. linkedin is what u get when a world high on credentials inevitably incentivizes goodhartian sloptimization. this corner of the web is its perfect antithesis. if u left ur name behind and with it ur hard-earned credentials, accolades, networth, and reputation, can ur ideas stand on their own merit? only here can random talented highschoolers from economically-remote corners of the world routinely interact with, or even intellectually challenge, renowned scientists and engineers operating at the frontiers of their fields. regardless of ur background, here, u get filtered only on the basis of ur ideas. subliminal biases aren't merely discouraged but largely subverted. the people i have chosen to follow are those whose bright minds have shone through their spoken words, judged solely by my own intellectual taste, irrespective of any other dubiously correlated proxy. as for the notorious risk of echo-chambers and the vulnerability to virality-maximizing intellectually-shallow mind-candy? skill issue.
